NAME: Chinese Herbal Lip Balm, 0.5oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This formula is created from Sun Si-miao’s and Wang Tao’s favorite Chinese herbs for soothing, smoothing, and moisturizing the lips.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
This formula is created from Sun Si-miao's and Wang Tao's favorite Chinese herbs for soothing, smoothing, and moisturizing the lips. The Chinese herbs in this formula have been used to promote lip health and beauty for over 1,000 years.

The addition of superior botanical oils and synergistic essential oils puts this product light years ahead of most lip balms. This is not a frivols cosmetic one might use to smell good and look good. It does provide both of those benefits. However, this medicinal cosmetic is designed to deliver some real therapeutic assistance to the lips.

The intent of this herbal formula is the protection and maintenance of healthy tissue of this exposed skin. The lips do not have sweat glands. So, they are naturally more prone to dryness and are also less protected from external invasions. The herbs in this formula bring much needed help to the lips in their unending work of interacting with the outside environment.

Some specific actions of these herbs are:

  1. The expelling of toxins and the support for the circulation and moving of energy and fluids. This circulation dispels toxins and brings nutrient rich blood and moisture into the surrounding tissues.
  2. Some herbs have anti-bacterial actions and some herbs support the natural "warmth" of tissues that help to dissuade the establishment of toxic accumulation.
  3. Some herbs are helping to support "cooling" of overly warm tissues (e.g., inflammation and swelling). The overall effect is to help maintain homeostasis or the "Goldie Locks" zone of just right, not too hot and not too cold.

The powerhouse formulation of botanical oils in this formula is quite unique in a lip balm. Some of the oils are particularly effective as carrier oils that can reportedly penetrate more easily into the skin, thus carrying the nutrients and the beneficial compounds of the essential oils and herbs into the deeper tissue of the lips. Some of the oils and waxes are protective and sealing in nature. These oils are not overly greasy. The balance between absorption and surface protection is "just right".

One aspect of this amazing product is the fragrant herbs that "move qi" or circulate energy and fluids. This herbal fragrance is subtly apparent, underscoring the light floral aroma of the essential oils. Jatamansi or Indian Valerian root has a sweet smell that holds the other aromas together. Jatamansi is also a heavyweight of an essential oil. In the East it is well known to impart incredible healing benefits internally and topically when applied to the skin. The other more common essential oils are no lightweights when it comes to promoting healthy skin. In addition to their general ?healing? abilities they are also known to protect against infections and invasion of external pathogens.

NAME: Cotton Flannel 13" x 15
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: A richly textured, heavy quality fabric used for castor oil packs.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Pure, Unbleached Wool & Cotton Flannel

A richly textured, heavy quality fabric used for castor oil packs. Its weight and strength allow it to be reused many times. Comprehensive instructions for preparation and use of castor oil packs are included. 13" x 15" (3 thicknesses sewn)

 CASTOR OIL PACK (COTTON OR WOOL FLANNEL) 

GENERAL DIRECTIONS: 

 

  1. Make a pack of appropriate size and saturate with castor oil. (Oil may be preheated or used with heating pad or hot water bottle. Do not use heat if infection or fever is present or suspected). 
  2. Position pack over affected area and cover with a piece of plastic and heating pad if desired. A towel may be used to help protect bedding.
  3. Allow pack to remain for an hour or more.  Avoid falling asleep with heating pad turned on, or use a hot water bottle.
  4. After pack is removed, cleanse skin with a solution of baking soda in water (1 teaspoonful to a pint) or our convenient Castor Clean™ or Castor Clean™ Towlettes.
  5. Store pack in plastic bag or other container in a cool dry place when not in use.
  6. Use pack daily or in a regular cycle (ex. 2 - 3 consecutive days a week) until results are obtained.

CASTOR OIL PACK HOLDER DIRECTIONS:

Place vinyl side of holder against saturated wool or cotton flannel that is positioned on desired body area. Center pack between the flaps, and secure with straps. Insert heating pad inside pouch of holder, if desired. Adjust heat setting as necessary. Hand wash with mild soap and water. Vinyl may be cleansed with solution of baking soda and water if desired.

Other Suggestions for Use of Castor Oil Packs:

 Wrap an ace bandage loosely around the pack and body to hold pack in place

Use the pack to administer other packs and poultices, such as grape, mullein, vinegar and salt, Alka-Thyme, and Epsom salts.
INGREDIENTS: Pure, Unbleached Wool & Cotton Flannel

NAME: Damp or UTI, Steam - Douche - Soak - Enema Kit
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: For genitourinary damp, UTI or skin damp patterns: vaginal steam, douche, peri anal steam, enema or soak.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
2 cups of raw premium and organic herbs, 60ml catheter tip syringe and instruction kit in a 100% recycled and compostable food grade bag. We do not make samples for these kits. Try a kit! One kit contains 2-4 applications.

DAMP / UTI  KIT

Versatile herb kits with easy application syringes. Full instructions come with each kit. 

EACH KIT contains:

– 2 cups of raw herbs of premium or certified organic quality. This means they have been tested for any heavy metals, pesticide residues or contaminants above and beyond USDA certified organic standards. Each kit is in a 100% compostable and food grade paper bag with a zip seal. 

– 1x 60ml applicator syringe with catheter tip. 

– Full instructions for each kind of application options. Please read fully before using.

DAMP / UTI  KIT

For genitourinary damp, UTI or skin damp patterns: vaginal steam, douche, peri anal steam, enema or soak.

Use caution with steaming for acute UTI with an active fever. Please read contraindications below. Use as a body temperature douche instead. You can apply as a bath soak for skin or tissue conditions with damp patterns, or use a room temperature soak for male genitals. Eg. Prostate or genito-urinary conditions with Damp affecting the function, skin or urinary flow. 

BLOOD STAGNATION KIT (default kit for STEAMING)

For default steaming and blood stagnation patterns. Steam & douche for gynecology patterns like period pain, stagnant blood, endometriosis. Peri-anal steam or enema for hemorrhoids, fissures, masses. Soak for any blood stagnation patterns in a bath, or as a room temperature male genital soak. Eg. Prostate conditions with blood stagnation or masses. Skin conditions with blood stagnation or bruising. 

BIOME RESTORE KIT

For itchiness, bacterial imbalances like thrush and vaginosis or for viral lesions like herpes or HPV. For genitourinary, bowel or skin bacterial or viral patterns with itch or lesions. You may steam, douche, peri anal steam, enema or soak as is appropriate.

ALL kits are flexible for use as a steam, douche, soak or enema. With each kit of 2 cups raw herbs you can make:

  • 2 applications as a steam or bath soak by decocting 1 cup. 
  • 4 douche, enema or male genital soaks from one kit, by decocting 1/2 cup. 
  • You can also use the steam decoctions as a douche or enema after steaming.

These products are for use as guided by practitioners who have some training in steaming. Please refer to your practitioner for further instructions and the full instruction packet that comes with each kit.

General CONTRAINDICATIONS for STEAMING:  

You may choose another style of application if steaming is contraindicated

  • Active fever from infection  (see notes below).
  • Ulcerated or open wound susceptible to infection (see notes below).
  • Menstruation or ovulation.
  • Spontaneous bleeding, heavy or light, outside of usual cycle (any bleeding times).
  • During Miscarriage (again, any gyne bleeding times).
  • During Pregnancy.  (Post partum steaming can begin around 9-13 days after giving birth. For each case it is best to consult a post partum steam trained practitioner as it depends on diagnosis). 
  • After ovulation while trying to conceive. (Steaming has been used to develop egg quality in advance as part of fertility preparation). 

NOTES  on Contraindications:

The contraindication for infection is about the presence of a) fever or b) open wounds which will get worse with damp and steam. 

  1. A) FEVER: If someone has a fever due to an infection, (gyne infection or otherwise) steaming is contraindicated, but you will often see hot baths or showers recommended for certain types of fever but not for others. With diagnosis, a practitioner can look at what the nature of the cause of the fever is and if warmth and steam will help to resolve it and release the exterior, or if it will exacerbate heat and fever.  If you are unsure, or if the fever is going to get worse from a steam, then you can  consider if using the herbal decoction as a douche would be appropriate. You may also decide to wait until the fever has resolved. The applicator syringe is 60ml with a catheter tip which is great for douche insertion and you can use less water than you would to create the douche decoction as for a steam decoction. Amounts and temperature guides are given in the instructions.
  2. B) OPEN WOUNDS: If someone has any open skin wounds that can get infected from the toes up to the waist then steaming can be a risk because you wrap the whole lower body in a sheet or blanket to keep the steam inside. Things like leg ulcers would be a direct risk with steaming. Again you can decide if a body temperature or slightly warmer douche might be appropriate. If there are open wounds on the upper half of the body that are not infected or ulcerated they will often be ok, as long as the steam blanket is wrapped from the toes to the waist. 

OPTIONS FOR EACH KIT – detailed instructions come with each kit.

Steam: 1 cup decocted and steamed as warm as is comfortable to sit in for 20 minutes wrapped in a blanket. 

Douche: ½  cup decocted (or use the decoction from a steam session) and applied at body temperature or a bit warmer for cold gyne patterns. 97 – 102F / 36- 39C

Enema: ½  cup decocted and applied at body temperature or a bit warmer for cold large intestine patterns. 97 – 102F / 36- 39C.

Male genital soak: ½  cup decocted and cooled to below body temperature, around room temperature 75-85F  or 23C -30C then used as a soak. Testicles are a bit cooler and don’t do well with heating. The standard healthy testicle temperature is 94-95F / 34-35C. 

Bath Soak: 1 cup decocted and added to a bath for skin issues.

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. For further care we recommend Chinese Medicine practitioners. 

COMPOSTABLE: The stand up pouch for the herbs is made from 100% compostable materials and is food safe. This zipper pouch is made with renewable Kraft paper. The inside is laminated with plant-based PLA and a protective coating, providing a high freshness barrier. Please tear off the paper label before composting, it is only the printed part of the label that needs to be removed. Some white paper reside and the non toxic glue is safe to compost. The packaging for the 60ml catheter tip syringe is not compostable but is as is, providing a sterile seal on each new syringe. Thankyou for looking after our soil and environment. We do our best to source green packaging options.
INGREDIENTS:
*Qu Mai (dianthi herba), *Chun Gen Pi (ailanthi cortex), *Mu Tong (akebia trifoliata), *Shi Wei (pyrrosiae folium), *Ai Ye (artemisiae argyi folium), *Bian Xu (polygonum aviculare), *Hong Hua (carthami flos).

~ 100 % Non GMO.
** Certified organic ingredient.
* Wildcrafted or premium ingredient. Tested pesticide, heavy metal & contaminant free.

NAME: Diaper Skin Soother Plus
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Diaper rash, genital and groin eczema, female and male yeast infections, and other red, hot rashes of various sorts.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Red, hot, skin that is obviously painful. Diaper rash is a horrible thing to see. I remember when our daughter Emily had diaper rash. It was heart-wrenching to see her suffer with deep red splotches. (We unfortunately had not developed this product yet.)

Diaper rash is a form of dermatitis (skin inflammation). Most children suffer from it at one point or another. People often believe that it is from parent neglect and not changing diapers frequently enough. Studies show that this is rarely the cause.

There are many possible underlying causes. It can be from contact /allergic reactions to creams, wipes or diapers. It can be from rubbing or friction. It can come from food sensitivities. The irritated skin can also be infected by bacteria (Staph or Strep) or yeast (Candida). In the herbal view of things this type of hot, red, damp skin condition is usually considered 'damp heat'.

Our Emily Diaper Skin Soother Plus was formulated with all of the causes above in mind. There are just 6 simple ingredients and like all of our products, it was formulated for people who read labels and have sensitive skin. It is a gentle, unscented balm unlike any other diaper product that we know of. Here are the ingredients and their traditional indications 1:

Organic Sunflower Oil: Known as a ‘barrier’ oil and acts like the body’s own protective oils. It is full of vitamin E which is good for the skin.

Beeswax: serves as a lubricant and a barrier and has been used for its antiseptic and healing properties for thousands of years.

Frankincense: Traditionally used in the treatment of injury and skin conditions to reduce swelling, alleviate pain and promote healing.

Red Peony Root: Traditionally used to ‘clear heat; and cool. Also used for swelling, pain and injury. Antibacterial: demonstrates an inhibitory effect on certain bacteria.

Dictamnus Root Bark: A bitter and cold herb used traditionally for extreme heat signs, ‘damp-heat’. Used for sores, rashes, eczema and demonstrates an antifungal effect.

Phellodendron Bark: Another bitter cold herb traditionally used for ‘damp-heat’ presentations in the genital /anal area. Drains heat from sores and lesions. Demonstrates antimicrobial and antifungal effect.

Sources: (1) Bensky, D., & Gamble, A. (1993). Chinese Herbal Medicine: Materia Medica. Seattle, WA: Eastland Press, Inc and (2) Chen, John K. and Chen, Tina T. (2008) Chinese Herbal Formulas and Applications. New York: Art of Medicine Press.

While we can’t and don’t make any medical claims, we hope you will find the product soothes skin affected by many different types of red, hot, angry skin conditions. It is not only for diaper conditions. We have also received positive feedback from people using it for other conditions like: Genital and groin eczema, Female and male yeast infections, and other red, hot rashes of various sorts.

Here is feedback from a few of the mom’s in our product testing group:

It is full of vitamin E which is good for the skin. <EOL> <EOL>	Beeswax: serves as a lubricant and a barrier and has been used for its antiseptic and healing properties for thousands of years. <EOL> <EOL>	Frankincense: Traditionally used in the treatment of injury and skin conditions to reduce swelling, alleviate pain and promote healing. <EOL> <EOL>	Red Peony Root: Traditionally used to ‘clear heat; and cool. Also used for swelling, pain and injury. Antibacterial: demonstrates an inhibitory effect on certain bacteria. <EOL> <EOL>	Dictamnus Root Bark: A bitter and cold herb used traditionally for extreme heat signs, ‘damp-heat’. NAME: Dit Da Jow Pain Relieving Roll-on
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Formulated to reduce inflammation, promote circulation, strengthen the sinews and relieve pain associated with trauma & injury; excellent for athletes, weekend warriors, and everyday aches & pains.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Dit Da Jow, translating as "fall & hit wine" is an aged infusion of Chinese herbs soaked in alcohol. This is classically the go-to pain reliever for martial artists. Formulated to reduce inflammation, promote circulation, strengthen the sinews and relieve pain associated with trauma & injury; excellent for athletes, weekend warriors, and everyday aches & pains.

DIRECTIONS: Shake well. Apply topically to the affected area 3-5 times a day, or as needed. For external use only, do not ingest. Do not use on broken skin or open wounds, avoid contact with eyes. Discontinue use if skin sensitivity occurs.
INGREDIENTS: alcohol, xue jie (daemonoropis resina), xu duan (dipsacus), gu sui bu (drynaria rhizome), mu xiang (auckland radix), er cha (catechu), jiang huang (turmeric rhizome), tao ren (peach kernel), hong hua (safflower flower), ru xiang (frankincense), mo yao (myrrh), zhi zi (gardenia seeds), bing pian (borneol)

NAME: Dr Bob's Medicated Oil, 2 oz.
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This is Bob Flaw's rendition of Po Sum On (Bao Xin An) Medicated Oil which was first introduced in 1907.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION: This is Bob Flaw's rendition of Po Sum On (Bao Xin An) Medicated Oil which was first introduced in 1907. In the early 1900's, Kwok Chu-nam, an expert in Chinese medicine, developed a medicated oil for external use with a blend of Chinese medicinal herbs. He named it Po Sum On, "Protect the Heart" Medicated Oil. As the story goes, friends and relatives were given this new product to try. When its effects were further proven, the product was officially marketed in Hong Kong and, from there, throughout East Asia. With a proven healing power for all sorts of complaints and supported by word-of-mouth, Po Sum On eventually became a household name in the Far East. Now this oil is available in an American version. It is still made with the same high quality ingredients but according to Western standards of manufacturing and packaging at a significantly lower price.
INGREDIENTS:
Bo He You ( Peppermint oil - Oleum Menthae Piperitae )
Xue Jie ( Sanguis Draconis )
Cha You (Tea oil - Oleum Camelliae Theae, Tea Oil, not tea tree oil )
Huang Qin ( Radix Scutellariae )
Gui You ( Cinnamon oil - Oleum Cinnamomi Cassiae )
Gan Cao ( Radix Glycyrrhizae )
DOSAGE: Adults and children two years of age and older: Apply to affected area not more than 3=4 times daily. Children under two years of age: Do not use; consult a licensed health care practitioner.
IMAGE: P/blue poppy Dr. Bob's Medicated Oil.jpg

WESTERN_SYMPTOMOLOGY: disperses inflammation and stops pain and itching

NAME: Dr. Sun's Age Defying Serum, 2oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This amazingly nourishing formula can be applied multiple times a day. The herbal formula comes from Sun Si-miao’s famous work The Essential Prescriptions Worth a Thousand Pieces of Gold. Sun Si-miao is one of the most respected scholar-physicians in the entire history of Chinese Medicine.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
This is the first of its kind facial oil serum with a unique synergism of harmonious layers. It's chock-full of antioxidants and skin-nourishing properties with its potent herbal-infused Chinese herbal formula, specifically formulated with powerful plant oils and well-loved and respected essential oils. 

The Chinese herbal formula for this unique oil serum comes from Doctor Sun Simiao’s "Qianjin Yaofang" or The Essential Prescriptions Worth a Thousand Pieces of Gold: 

  • The potent Chinese herbal formula works to dispel toxins and stagnation, while encouraging the healthy re-energization of the tissues and promoting the irrigation of cells with nutrient-rich moisture and blood. 
     

  • Powerful botanical oils deliver skin-transforming nutrients to moisturize, feed, and protect skin cells. They help reduce inflammation, provide antioxidant protection, and even out skin's pigmentation. Some of these oils have been studied for their abilities to encourage collagen growth. 

  • The well-respected essential oils are known for their multiple benefits and, specifically, their anti-aging effects on the skin. While Jatamansi is less well known in the West, in the East it has a notable reputation and proven track record for skin healing. 

Suitable for:

Great for all skin types. The pure ingredients in this serum give it a rich and earthy aroma, which aids in feeling grounded and centered.
INGREDIENTS:
CHINESE MEDICINE HERBAL FORMULA -

  • Bai fu zi - Typhonium - eliminates toxicity
  • Bai Zhi - Fragrant Angelica- reduces swelling
  • Chuan Xiong - Sichuan Lovage - promotes movement of Qi and invigorates the blood
  • Fuling - Poria - reduces puffiness
  • Ling Qian Cao - Lysimachia - regulates the flow of Qi
  • Sha Ren - Chinese Amomum Fruit - antibacterial properties to prevent blemishes
  • Zhi Xiang Fu- Prepared Cyperus Rhizome - removes blood stagnation and encourages movement of Qi
  • Gan Song - Chinese Nardostachys - promotes movement of Qi

BOTANICAL OILS

  • Fractionated coconut oil- Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride (MCT) - helps keep skin soft and nourished; provides a soothing barrier without clogging pores. Unlike virgin coconut oil, fractionated coconut oil is noncomodogenic (won't clog pores) because it has the comodogenic long chain fatty acids removed and is in a liquid form.
  • Tea seed oil - Camellia Sinesis - antioxidant properties protect the skin against free radicals; improves skin texture and appearance by boosting skin’s collagen production
  • Rosehip oil - Rosa Canina - dry oil that easy absorbs into skin; offers an assortment of vitamins and antioxidants; contains retinoic acid to help even out skin tone and lightens pigmentation
  • Watermelon seed oil - Citrullus vulgaris - ideal moisturizer for both oil and dry skin; powerful antioxidant properties to prevent skin from free radicals; detoxifies the skin and reduces inflammation
  • Hibiscus seed oil - Hibiscus Sabdariffa - an easily absorbed oil; rich in antioxidants to help reduce appearance of fine lines; full of gentle natural acids to help exfoliate the skin and clear dead skin cells; antibacterial properties
  • Rosemary Seed Extract

 

ESSENTIAL OILS - 

  • Lavender - Lavender angustifolia/Lavender officianalis - promotes a clear and healthy complexion; soothes dry skin; kills bacteria to prevent and heal breakouts; reduces inflammation, full of antioxidants to protect skin from free radicals
  • Frankincense - Boswellia Carterii - repairs and regenerates skin cells to reduce appearance of aging and scarring; anti-microbial; stimulates growth of new skin cells; reduces redness
  • Geranium – Pelargonium graveolens - clears skin by balancing serum production; evens skin tone; tightens skin and slows premature aging; kills bacteria; promotes regeneration of new skin cells to diminish signs of aging
  • Rose Geranium - Pelargonium Gravolens - balances skin’s natural oil production; minimizes appearance of enlarged pores; reduces swelling
  • Jatamansi - Nardostachys jatamansi - improves complexion and luster of skin giving a youthful appearance; relieves itching; purifies the blood; reduces redness; antioxidant; stimulates fibroblasts which produces collagen and elastin to reduces appearance of fine lines and wrinkles

NAME: Dragon's Blood Liniment

This liniment is for the treatment of blood stasis due to traumatic injury when there is pronounced pain and ecchymosis.*

Formula Rationale
Xue Jie (Sanguis Draconis), Song Jie (Lignum Pini Nodi), Ru Xiang (Olibanum), Mo Yao (Myrrha), Da Huang (Radix Et Rhizoma Rhei), Hong Hua (Flos Carthami), Su Mu (Lignum Sappan), and Tian San Qi (Pseudogenseng) all quicken the blood and dispel stasis and all are commonly used for the treatment of traumatic injury within Chinese medicine. Zhang Nao (Camphora) and Bing Pian (Borneolum) aromatically penetrate and free the flow of blockage and obstruction as well as disperse swelling.*

Hong Hua ( Flos Carthami )

Bing Pian ( Borneolum )

NAME: External Analgesic Pain Relief Liquid, 6.76oz
CHINESE_NAME: 五像牌梁財信田七跌打酒 (大)
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Lung Choy Shung Pain Relief Liquid is effective in cleaning and disinfecting minor scrapes, cuts and burns. This popular antiseptic from China is effective to reduce the likelihood of skin infections.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Lung Choy Shung Pain Relief Liquid is effective in cleaning and disinfecting minor scrapes, cuts and burns. This popular antiseptic from China is effective to reduce the likelihood of skin infections.

How to Use

First, you should clean the affected area of skin. Then apply a small amount of the antiseptic to that area 1-3 times each day. You can cover it with a sterile bandage to reduce the chance of infection. If you do put a bandage on it, allow the skin to dry first.

Warnings
For external use only.
Flammable, keep away from fire or flame.
Do not use:
in the eyes
over large areas of the body.
Ask a doctor before you use if you have:
deep or puncture wounds
animal bites
serious burns
Stop use and ask a doctor if:
condition worsens
infection occurs
symptoms persists for more than 7 days
redness, irritation, swelling, or pain persists or increases
nausea, vomiting, abdominal discomfort, diarrhea, or skin rash occurs.
Keep out of reach of children to avoid accidental poisoning. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.
INGREDIENTS:
Active Ingredients
Menthol 2.8% & Camphor 2.8%

Inactive Ingredients
Alcohol, alisma plantago-aquatica subsp. orientale root , angelica dahurica root, angelica sinensis root, atractylodes lancea root, atractylodes macrocephala root, cinnamomum cassia twig, citrus aurantium fruit, cullen corylifolium fruit, cuscuta chinensis seed, cyperus rotundus tuber, dioscorea villosa tuber, erycibe obtusifolia stem, fennel seed, frankincense, gleditsia sinensis fruit, ligusticum sinense subsp. chuanxiong root, myrrh, notopterygium franchetii root, paeonia x suffruticosa root bark, panax notoginseng root, polygonatum sibiricum root, polysorbate 80, prunus armeniaca seed, purified water, and tangerine peel.
DOSAGE: Clean the affected area. Apply a small amount of this product on the area 1 to 3 times daily. May be covered with a sterile bandage. If bandaged, let dry first.

NAME: Flying Dragon Liniment  2oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: The herbs in this liniment are formulated to stop pain by warming and moving Qi and Blood in the affected area. This liniment may be used for any type of muscle or joint pain.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
• All purpose, General Use Liniment

Relieves all types of muscle & joint pain – acute or chronic: sore back and neck, tight, arthritic pain, injuries and gyn cramping, any chronic pain. Especially when pain improves with heat: heating pad, hot tub, shower or bath.  Relieves sore, achy muscles after physical workouts, gardening, sports and repetitive use activities. Improves flexibility and motility for arthritic pain.

  • Warming, Oil-based Liniment

Circulates Qi & Blood to stop pain. The herbs have a proven track record in TCM (Traditional Chinese Medicine) for improving achy pain that worsens with cold or damp, rainy weather

  • Eco-friendly/Green Product

Made with organic oil and many wild-crafted herbs.  Chemical, preservative & sulfite free.  Packaged in a glass bottle.

  • Artisan Oil – Made in USA

Handmade by herbalist in Grass Valley, California with lots of TLC. We began making this liniment in 2002.

Traditional Chinese Medical (TCM) theory states that pain is caused by Qi (energy) and Blood not moving in the channels and muscle tissue. The herbs in this liniment are formulated to stop pain by warming and moving Qi and Blood in the affected area. This liniment may be used for any type of muscle or joint pain. For use after workout, gardening, arthritic pain, injury or any chronic pain. Especially indicated when pain is relieved by application of heat, e.g.: heating pad, hot shower, bath, jacuzzi or hot tub. Warming, oil-based liniment. Moves Qi & Blood to stop pain. Herbs have a proven track record in TCM (Traditional Chinese Medicine) traumatology for stopping pain. Eco-friendly - green product: Made with organic oils and many wild-crafted herbs. Preservative & sulfite free. Packaged in a glass bottle. Artisan oil: Handmade by herbalist in Asheville, NC, with lots of TLC. Energetically tested by kinesiologist, medical intuitive and energy worker who all say Its great. I have tested Flying Dragon Liniment in my clinic for many years and can tell you with certainty that Patients Love It. I firmly believe that Flying Dragon Liniment should be in everybodys medicine cabinet, along side the aspirin and the box of band aids. Believe me, of the 3, Flying Dragon Liniment will get used the most. After using this liniment and seeing how effective it is at stopping pain, you wont want to be caught without a bottle readily on hand. Kath Bartlett, Product Formulator, Licensed Acupuncturist and Traditional Chinese Herbalist
INGREDIENTS: Cinnamon, fennel, peach seed, safflower, myrrh, angelica, clematis, impatients, Chinese quince fruit, aconite, notopterigium, lycopodium
DOSAGE: Apply several times each day to the affected area, as necessary, and immediately before and after strenuous activity.
PROPERTIES: Relieves aches and pains.
WESTERN_SYMPTOMOLOGY: Muscle or joint pain, such as sore back, neck, and knees, carpel tunnel, tennis elbow or tight, achy muscles.

NAME: Golden Goddess Facial Gua Sha Oil, 1oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: ReDermaVive's Golden Goddess Facial Gua Sha oil provides the perfect slip surface for your gua sha tool to effectively slide over the skin. At the same time, it delivers numerous nutrients for your skin. The synergism of the ingredients and the lifting action of the gua sha results in a firmer, uplifted, smooth, clear, more youthful looking skin.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
ReDermaVive's Golden Goddess Facial Gua Sha oil provides the perfect slip surface for your gua sha tool to effectively slide over the skin. At the same time, it delivers numerous nutrients for your skin. The synergism of the ingredients and the lifting action of the gua sha results in a firmer, uplifted, smooth, clear, more youthful looking skin.

For this gua sha oil, we drew from an unfinished formula that Bob Flaws (the original owner of Blue Poppy Enterprises) started for treating stretch marks. It seems appropriate that face lifting has similar conditions and shares similar needs as those for treating stretch marks.

The formula notes that Bob Flaws left created the core herbal inspiration for our Golden Goddess Facial Gua Sha Oil:

In Chinese medicine, the net like structure of the skin is referred to as cou li or interstices... the interstices can either be shut and dense (bi mi) or scattered and relaxed (Shu Song). The coarsening and lack of tone of the skin due to aging is a process of the slackening of the interstices coupled with the lack of nourishment and moistening.
While the root disease mechanism of stretch marks is qi vacuity, once stretch marks have occurred, this qi vacuity is complicated by blood stasis in the network vessels locally. Therefore, within this formula, Huang Qi and Ren Shen strongly supplement the original qi, while Zhen Zhu clears heat, promotes healing, and engenders flesh when applied externally. ...research in China has shown that the external application of both Huang Qi and Ren Shen can promote healing of the skin...
INGREDIENTS:
Chinese Herbs:

  • Margarita Pearl (Zhen Zhu)
  • Trichosanthes Seed (Gua Lou Ren)
  • Gotu Kola (Jie Xue Cao)
  • Astralagus (Huang Qi)
  • Safflower (Hong Hua)
  • Dong Quai (Dang Gui)
  • Trumpet Flower (Ling Xiao Hua)
  • Asian Ginseng (Ren Shen)

Botanical Oils:

  • Fractionated Coconut Oil 
  • Tea Seed Oil
  • Babchi Oil
  • Green Coffee Bean Oil
  • Hibiscus Seed Oil
  • Rosehip Oil

Essential Oils:

  • Frankincense
  • May Chang
  • Neroli
  • Clary Sage
  • Jatamansi

NAME: Herbal Hyaluronic Gel Micro 1 Sample, 5ml
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Herbal Hyaluronic Gel Micro 1 is a 1.1% high molecular weight hyaluronic acid gel infused with herbs that stimulate and provide nutrients for collagen induction. It is paired with our Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic for facial acupuncture protocols.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Herbal Hyaluronic Gel Micro 1 is a 1.1% high molecular weight hyaluronic acid gel infused with herbs that stimulate and provide nutrients for collagen induction. It is paired with our Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic for facial acupuncture protocols. Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 1 is for use before and during microneedling or facial acupunture. It is soothing and filled with herbal actives that produce collagen and nourish the skin, including: Ji Xue Xao (Gotu Kola), Mu Zei (Horsetail) and Vanilla bean. Together these ingredients provide a wide array of potent collagen induction nutrients, aminos, silica, vitamins and minerals for skin. It is anti inflammatory, soothing, reduces fine lines, speeds up healing, increases elasticity, hydrating and smells like vanilla. All ingredients are organic or tested beyond organic standards for pesticides, heavy metals and contaminants. 

DIRECTIONS:

  • Apply Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 1 on slightly wet, clean skin before, during and after microneedling or facial acupuncture.
  • Practitioners: see the facial acupuncture information on our wholesale site. 
  • Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 1 is best used before, during and after micro needling, derma rolling or facial acupuncture.
  • For daily use and light moisturizing, use Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 2. Apply it after washing, before any heavy moisturizers or oil based products.
  • Hyaluronic acid gel deeply hydrates the skin and is naturally found in skin, keeping it healthy, youthful and also protecting the lipid barrier. It particularly suits skin with sensitivities, dryness, dull tone, fine lines, deep wrinkles, inflammations, redness, pimples or acne. 

Facial at home skincare steps. Our full facial acupuncture and micro needling sequence for licensed acupuncturists is on our wholesale site.

  1. Apply one of our Medi-Pearl treatments, for dry or oily skin. More information on how to do the treatments with gua sha is on the Medi Pearl pages. Remove the treatment.
  2. Spritz and finish cleaning with our Balancing Skin Toner. 
  3. Apply Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 2 while the skin is still damp with skin toner. 
  4. Finish with our Non Linear Serum Moisturizer about 5 minutes after, or as soon as you notice your skin has absorbed most of the Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic.

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. For further care we recommend Chinese Medicine practitioners. 

BONUS VIOLET GLASS: This toner is packaged in Violet Science Glass, which is the best packaging we can use for products with medicinal oils or active ingredients. Plastics can leach out toxic chemicals when oils are stored in them, and violet glass is able to preserve ingredients for a long time, better than any other color glass. See our FAQ to learn more about Violet Glass and why it is so amazing.

GIFT: We recommend you keep your violet glass container when your product runs out. Wash it and reuse it in your kitchen. This dark ultra violet glass appears black but is Violet in the sunlight. It will preserve herbs, spices, oils, culinary leftovers, medicinal potions and more. The retail value of the 100ml violet glass bottle alone is currently around $18. This is our gift for you to keep. The medicine just keeps on going!

Distilled imploded water, **Gotu Kola (centella asiatica), **Horsetail (equisetum arvense), **Vanilla planifolia bean, Sodium Hyaluronate 1%, ^^Preservative (propanediol & ethylhexyl-glycerin & potassium sorbate).

NAME: Hong Hoa (Hong Hua) Oil
CHINESE_NAME: 公益正紅花油 (1 fl. oz.)(30毫升)
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This external analgesic oil contains methyl salicylate*
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Hong Hoa Oil External Analgesic

Hong Hoa Oil (External Analgesic) is an effective, herbal-medicated oil that helps to temporarily relieve minor aches and pains throughout your body. It is particularly effective on sore muscles and joints which can be caused by bruises, sprains, strains and arthritis.*

Benefits

This external analgesic oil contains methyl salicylate which is effective as a topical ointment for your skin to relieve muscle and joint pain. When you apply it, you will feel a burning or a cooling sensation. This is normal, and helps your body to better deal with the pain in the affected area.*
INGREDIENTS:
Active ingredients:

  • Methyl salicylate 60%

Inactive ingredients:

  • Cinnamon oil
  • Clove oil
  • Turpentine oil
DOSAGE: adults and children 2 and older apply to the sore area of the body 3-4 times each day. Children under 2 should not use this.

NAME: Hot Skin Soother, Tube
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Our Hot Skin Soother is designed to be soothing for all types of red, hot skin issues. Think of it to soothe hot, tired muscles, sweat rashes, heat rashes and issues in skin folds, armpit, groin, elbow and knee creases. It is unscented and made of just six natural ingredients: organic sunflower oil, beeswax, frankincense, red peony root, dictamnus root and phellodendron amurense bark.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Our Hot Skin Soother is designed to be soothing for all types of red, hot skin issues. Think of it to soothe hot, tired muscles, sweat rashes, heat rashes and issues in skin folds, armpit, groin, elbow and knee creases. It is unscented and made of just six natural ingredients: organic sunflower oil, beeswax, frankincense, red peony root, dictamnus root and phellodendron amurense bark.

These tubes contain the same great balm, just in different packaging. They are a little over 15% bigger than our standard 1.8 oz jars. They are also easy to carry, in a pocket, diaper bag or purse. The tube allows you to easily apply a thin layer of our skin soothing balms without dipping your fingers into the jar. Easy and convenient!
INGREDIENTS: What's in it? Six simple ingredients: • Organic Sunflower Oil: chock full of Vitamin E, it soothes dry skin • Beeswax: a natural barrier that is both protective and antiseptic • Frankincense and Red Peony: This pair of herbs has been traditionally used to promote circulation and is said to "generate flesh" in Chinese herbology. The pair is also slightly analgesic so they may diminish discomfort of irritated skin. Peony also demonstrates an inhibitory action against some bacteria.  • Dictamnus Root Bark and Phellodendron Bark: These two herbs are categorized as bitter and cold and are used traditionally for extreme heat signs, 'damp-heat'. They are often used for sores, rashes, eczema and demonstrate antifungal and antimicrobial effects.

NAME: Hydrating Eye Cream
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Antioxidant rich, powerful, rejuvenates
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
The skin under your eyes is the thinnest and most delicate skin on the body, therefore, it needs a product that is thicker, richer and specially formulated to take care of its very specific needs. Our Body Nurish eye cream is loaded with plant-infused oils and potent antioxidants made to target every under eye issue on your list. Be sure to apply this one along the brow bone as well!

How to Use

Warm the balm with your fingers then dab a small amount around the eye area and brows.

Benefits

- Brightens*
- Firms and supports elasticity*
- Improves fine lines and wrinkles*
- Improves dry skin *

Here's how you can trust that our products will give you desired results without sacrificing quality:

food-grade preservatives only

We use food-grade preservatives only, never scary chemical preservatives, and we never use chemical emulsifiers, fragrances or alcohol.

High Quality Ingredients

We source cold-pressed, raw, organic oils, as well as high-quality, non-gmo, organic vitamins and extracts.

organic or wildcrafted herbs

We infuse our organic or wildcrafted herbs in Sunflower, Grapeseed, or Olive oil, using the slow method - no heat - to ensure that all of the nutrients are alive and potent.

At Peak Scents, we never outsource production because it allows us to guarantee that our products have the integrity our customers expect. We are committed to sourcing our ingredients through partners who share an aligned dedication to responsible practices. We are passionate about creating sustainable change in the world through intelligent, ethical business customs. Our commitment to never outsource production ensures that when you choose us as, you can trust the products you receive will adhere to those same ideals.
SUB_CATEGORIES: Holiday Gift Ideas || Topical Formulations >>> Facial Care
INGREDIENTS:
Plant infused oils of organic green tea, horsetail, comfrey leaf, licorice root, marshmallow root and white oak bark, beeswax, shea butter, cocoa butter, jojoba oil, rose hip seed oil, borage seed oil, virgin coconut oil, vitamin E oil, vitamin C ester, carrot oleoresin, lecithin, and essential oils of frankincense, neroli, jasmine, and clementine.

NAME: Iron Man Soak, 128 oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This proprietary blend of East Asian herbal ingredients, formulated specially for men, increases chi (energy) and circulation to give the most balanced condition possible.*
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Immerse yourself in this powerful formula, known throughout the centuries by East Asian doctors, martial artists and members of the royal families to promote strength, libido, vitality, and endurance.  This proprietary blend of East Asian herbal ingredients, formulated specially for men, increases chi (energy) and circulation to give the most balanced condition possible.  A fully balanced condition enables your body to function at its most optimal level allowing you to achieve and maintain incredible health.  Feel the difference for yourself!*

Directions: For an unforgettable experience shake well and pour desired amount of contents into a very warm bath. Fill bath so that the water level falls just below your chest. Immerse yourself in the herb infused water to remove toxins and to calm your mind and body. Relax, breathe deeply and rejuvenate your senses. For best results, remain in bath for at least 20 to 30 minutes, as long as you are comfortable. After bathing, allow the herbal water to remain on your skin and simply pat dry with a towel. Discover the difference for yourself.  Use 2-4 times a week for immediate relief and 2-4 times a month for maintenance.*

SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Formulated with Jade Powder, Ginseng and only the finest active herbal ingredients this detoxifying and anti-aging facial exfoliator gently sweeps away dead skin cells and impurities that can dull the surface of the skin while protecting against environmental toxins.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Formulated with Jade Powder, Ginseng and only the finest active herbal ingredients this detoxifying and anti-aging facial exfoliator gently sweeps away dead skin cells and impurities that can dull the surface of the skin while protecting against environmental toxins. This unique exfoliator softly polishes skin with non-abrasive Rose Hips leaving your skin silky smooth without irritation.  Rose Hips promote skin regeneration and are known to soothe and heal sun burns and skin burns. Their healing properties repair dry and sun damaged skin, and they can be used to reduce or eliminate the appearance of scars. Rose Hips have also been known to reduce the appearance of wrinkles, age spots, and to shrink large pores. Their powerful anti-aging properties promote the skin’s natural regeneration cycle helping it produce more collagen and elastin.  Your skin will look and feel healthy, radiant and youthful.

Use 2-4 Times a Week or As Needed [AM/PM]: Apply small amount to damp face and neck in light upward and outward circles. Avoid eye area. Rinse well

Skin Type: Normal/Dry/Aging/Oily

NAME: Jin Gu Wang Spray
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: An effective external, topical analgesic that can temporarily relieve minor aches and pains in your muscles and joints.*
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Jin Gu Wang External Analgesic Spray

Jin Gu Wang is an effective external, topical analgesic that can temporarily relieve minor aches and pains in your muscles and joints. It is highly effective in relieving minor pain associated with arthritis, strains, bruises and backaches.*

Benefits

Jin Gu Wang Spray contains camphor oil, which has been used throughout history in China as an topical analgesic. The oil comes from an extraction process on the common camphor tree.

Camphor oil is a very effective stimulant and helps to boost blood circulation to the area of the body where it is applied. It works very well as a topical analgesic for minor body aches and pains, as well. When it is applied to the affected area of the body, it causes the skin and underlying tissue to go numb. This helps to provide temporary pain relief. The cooling and penetrating effect also helps to cut down on inflammation in the body.*

Warnings
For external use only. 
Do not use_
- on wounds
- on irritated or damaged skin 
When using this product_
- do not bandage tightly
- avoid contact with the eyes or mucous membranes
Stop use and ask doctor if_
- condition worsens
- symptoms persist for more than 7 days
- symptoms clear up and occur again within a few days
- excessive irritation of the skin develops
- when using for pain of arthritis : 
- in conditions affecting children under 12 years of age 
- redness is present 
- pain persists for more than 10 days. 
Keep out of reach of children.
If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.
INGREDIENTS:
Active Ingredients:  Camphor 5.5 %, Menthol 5.5 %.  

Inactive Ingredients Aralia Armata [Aralia Armata (Wall. Ex G. Don) Seem.] Root and Stem, Cinnamon (Cinnamomum Cassia J.Presl.) Twig, Dimethyl Sulfoxide, Gleditsia (Gleditsia Sinensis Lam.) Fruit, Methyl Salicylate, Paniculate Swallowwort [Pycnostelma Paniculatum (Bge.) K. Schum] Herb, St. Thomas Bean [Entada Phaseoloides (L.) Merr.] Root, and Zedoary Rhizome.
PROPERTIES: Contains DMSO.  Do not use with Children under 2 years of age.
CONTRAINDICATIONS: - Adults and children 2 years of age and older: Apply to affected area not more than 3 to 4 times daily. - Children under 2 years of age: Do not use, consult a doctor.

NAME: Jin Si Gao Cooling Patch, 6ct
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Jin Si Gao aqua cooling plasters work as cooling therapy to help soothe tense or stiff muscles. With a soothing and gentle menthol and vanilla scent. Comparing to the traditional herbal plasters, which are mainly the herbal paste in natural rubber with a cloth backing, Jin Si Gao applied with jelly-like hydro-absorptive backing, which contains substantial amount of moisture to produce soothing and cooling relief. Hydro base makes Jin Si Gao skin friendly, easily applied and removed without staining clothes.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Jin Si Gao aqua cooling plasters work as cooling therapy to help soothe tense or stiff muscles. With a soothing and gentle menthol and vanilla scent. Made in Taiwan.

  •     Made with 100% herbal active ingredients to cover majority causes for pain
  •     Hydrogel base makes Jin Si Gao skin friendly
  •     An effective product to help in acute pain relief
  •     An ideal substance to maintain chronic pains condition
  •     Use to reinforce the acupuncture treatment
  •     Re-sealable package to retain its effectiveness

How does Jin Si Gao work?

Jin Si Gao is a combination of Traditional Chinese herbal formula with advanced technology of large-molecule hydropolymers. Jin Si Gao’s herbal formula contains 16 active herbs which were carefully chosen to work together holistically and synergistically. Some create the primary healing functions; some increase the action of the primary herbs, and some decrease adverse reactions from the primary and secondary herbs. This formula is developed basing on the fact that effects are interdependent. Inflammation, for example, increases pain and gets in the way of healing, so herbs which reduce inflammation also tend to reduce pain and promote healing. Swelling and bruising are caused by accumulations of fluid, so herbs which increase blood flow also reduce bruising and swelling. Therefore, for the purpose pain relief, this formula intends to be the most balanced formula and hits all the important points: pain relief, reduce inflammation, reduce swelling and bruising, increase blood flow, relax injured muscles, minimize tissue damage and promote healing.

Comparing to the traditional herbal plasters, which are mainly the herbal paste in natural rubber with a cloth backing, Jin Si Gao applied with jelly-like hydro-absorptive backing, which contains substantial amount of moisture to produce soothing and cooling relief. Hydro base makes Jin Si Gao skin friendly, easily applied and removed without staining clothes.
INGREDIENTS: Aqua, Sesamom indicum oil, Sodium Polyacrylate, Kaolin, Glycerin, Sorbitol, Cellulose Gum, Menthol, Vanilly Butyl Ether, Alcohol, Riccinus Communis Seed Oil, Polysorbate 80, Citric Acid, Methylparaben, Propylparaben

NAME: Jojoba Oil, 8oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Organic jojoba oil comes from the beans of a desert shrub. It is bright and golden in color with a mild odor, and is regarded as the most favored in the carrier oil family because of its advanced molecular stability. Also makes a great scalp cleanser for the hair, and is equally wonderful for the skin because it has absorption properties that are similar to our skin's own sebum.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Organic jojoba oil comes from the beans of a desert shrub. It is bright and golden in color with a mild odor, and is regarded as the most favored in the carrier oil family because of its advanced molecular stability. Also makes a great scalp cleanser for the hair, and is equally wonderful for the skin because it has absorption properties that are similar to our skin's own sebum.

Jojoba oil may become cloudy and solidify as the temperature drops. This is a normal process that occurs from the hardening of the fats and waxes, and it will become stable at or around room temperature. Since Jojoba is not an oil but rather a wax, its shelf life and stability is considerably higher then most oils and rancidity is very rarely a concern.

Extraction Method: Expeller-pressed
Refinement Techniques: Unrefined
Intended Use: Cosmetic use only

NAME: Juniper & Vetiver Balm, 2oz tin
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Infused with the healing embrace of desert jojoba, aloe vera, and shea butter, our formula offers solace to weather-beaten skin and wages war against the unyielding dryness that accompanies your rugged outdoor exploits.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Answer the primal call of the wild and embrace boundless adventures with our invigorating blend of Vetiver and rugged Juniper notes, a versatile scent that becomes your fearless companion on every untamed trail. Infused with the healing embrace of desert jojoba, aloe vera, and shea butter, our formula offers solace to weather-beaten skin and wages war against the unyielding dryness that accompanies your rugged outdoor exploits. The harmonious partnership of Juniper and Sandalwood work in untamed synergy to infuse your skin with untold vitality, ensuring a revitalized and robust complexion that speaks of the wild at heart. Whether applied after an expedition on chapped feet or as armor before conquering new frontiers, experience the commanding touch of this balm, and you might just find that there's no retreat from its transformative effects.

How to Use

To apply the balm, using your finger scoop up a small amount, and gently massage it into the skin using circular motions. Use as frequently as required, day or night. Keep in mind, a small amount is all you need to achieve great results, so use sparingly!

Benefits

Deep Hydration: Our all-purpose balm provides intense hydration, quenching dry skin and leaving it feeling soft and nourished.

Free From Harsh Chemicals: Rest assured, our balm is formulated without harsh chemicals, parabens, and sulfates, offering a clean and gentle solution for your skincare needs.

Soothing Relief: Experience instant relief from discomfort with the balm's soothing properties, ideal for irritated skin, chapped lips, and minor skin irritations.

Versatile Moisturization: From lips to elbows, knees to cuticles, this balm delivers versatile moisturization, catering to all areas for your body's needs.

Locks in Moisture: Formulated to create a protective barrier, the balm locks in moisture, shielding your skin from environmental factors that contribute to dryness.

Enhances Skin Texture: Regular use of the balm helps improve skin texture, promoting a smoother and more supple feel.

Calms Redness: Whether it's a sunburn, windburn, minor rashes, or post-shave irritation, the balm's calming ingredients work to reduce redness and inflammation.

Long-Lasting Comfort: Enjoy extended comfort with the balm's long-lasting effects, ensuring your skin stays moisturized throughout the day.

Promotes Healing: With its healing properties, the balm aids in the recovery of small cuts, scrapes, and cracked skin, fostering a rejuvenated appearance.

Travel Essential: Compact and convenient, the balm is a must-have travel companion, ready to tackle various skincare needs on the go.

Ideal for All Skin Types: Whether you have sensitive, dry, or normal skin, our balm is suitable for all skin types, making it a versatile addition to your skincare routine.

Multi-Seasonal Use: From the harsh cold of winter to the drying heat of summer, this balm adapts to different seasons, ensuring your skin stays comfortable year-round.

Eco-Friendly Choice: Choose a sustainable option with our eco-friendly packaging and ingredients, making a positive impact on both your skin and the environment.

Loved by All Ages: Whether you're caring for your own skin or your family's, this balm is suitable for all ages, becoming a staple in your household.

If you can't eat it, why put it on your skin?

Here at Peak Scents, we live by the principle - If you can't eat it, why put it on your skin? Did you know that the skin is our largest organ? What gets absorbed into our skin potentially effects all of our body system.

Here's how you can trust that our products will give you desired results without sacrificing quality:

food-grade preservatives only

We use food-grade preservatives only, never scary chemical preservatives, and we never use chemical emulsifiers, fragrances or alcohol.

High Quality Ingredients

We source cold-pressed, raw, organic oils, as well as high-quality, non-gmo, organic vitamins and extracts.

organic or wildcrafted herbs

We infuse our organic or wildcrafted herbs in Sunflower, Grapeseed, or Olive oil, using the slow method - no heat - to ensure that all of the nutrients are alive and potent.

At Peak Scents, we never outsource production because it allows us to guarantee that our products have the integrity our customers expect. We are committed to sourcing our ingredients through partners who share an aligned dedication to responsible practices. We are passionate about creating sustainable change in the world through intelligent, ethical business customs. Our commitment to never outsource production ensures that when you choose us as, you can trust the products you receive will adhere to those same ideals.

NAME: Luminous, 1.5oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Natural Premium Luxury Face Cream For All Skin Care Routines
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
24-Hour Daily Moisturizer

Parfait Visage has been reformulated into our NEW Luminous. Luminous is a hydrating moisturizer that your skin will adore! Perfect for day or night, this creamy-rich moisturizer deeply nourishes skin for a smooth, even complexion, while the antioxidants and exotic botanicals work to support healthy-looking skin. We've even packaged Luminous in an ultra-luxe MIRON Violetglass jar to preserve the delicate, natural plant-based ingredients.*

  • Day & Night Moisturizer

  • Nourishes & Calms Skin*

  • Antioxidant-Rich Formula for Healthy Looking Skin*

What Is Luminous?

Luminous is our day and night moisturizer that restores your skin for a smooth, even complexion. Your skin will be left feeling smooth and deeply nourished from the exotic botanicals and plant-based ingredients. Luminous makes for the perfect one-stop 24-hour daily moisturizer that your beauty routine will love! This creamy-rich moisturizer is also packed with antioxidants that encourage healthy-looking skin, cellular hydration, and renewal.*

Preserving this luxe, plant-based formula is important to us, which is why Luminous is packaged in MIRON Violetglass jars. The unique properties of this glass protect Luminous's ingredients from the harmful effects of light, increase shelf life, and revitalize their potency.*

To maximize the benefits:

  • Massage into clean, dry skin.

  • Use morning and night use as part of a hydrating skincare routine.*

  • Keep refrigerated to preserve the natural ingredients.

Why Your Skin Will Love Luminous

Let Luminous take your skincare routine to the next level.

Daily Moisturizer

This luxe moisturizer nourishes the skin for a smooth, even complexion. Plus, Luminous's creamy formula is packed with exotic botanicals make it perfect for day and night.*

Healthy Looking Skin*

Luminous is packed with phytonutrients and antioxidants that encourages cellular hydration and renewal for healthy looking skin. Plus, it calms the skin from daily environmental stressors.*

Great for All Skin Types

Luminous is not only a plant-based, clean moisturizer, but it's also great for all skin types — including oily, combination, dry, and sensitive. Luminous is also hypoallergenic!*

The Medi-Detox Pack is an effective, cleansing dental pack which contains premium quality bentonite clay and zeolite minerals. High quality clays and minerals have been used for centuries in many cultures to promote cleansing. In the past, certain sources were highly prized for their amazingly diverse cleansing effects. Bentonite is a smectite clay that has been formed through volcanic activity.

It exhibits a unique crystalline structure. These crystalline molecules act as transducers of light frequencies to encourage the cleansing process. Smectite clay has a unique, natural sorptive power with cleansing properties.

Once the clay mixture of this product has been used for cleansing of the oral cavity, its unique sorptive power has been exhausted so it is best to discard and not re-use it. Please enjoy the powerful effects of this excellent pack.

Smectite clays initially form through volcanic activity.  They have a crystalline structure that is unique to each clay.  These crystalline molecules act as transducers of light frequencies to encourage the cleansing process.  Smectite clays have a unique, natural adsorptive power has been exhausted so it is best to discard the clay.

    An effective cleansing pack featuring premium montmorillonite clay that naturally contains adsorptive calcium smectites, silica and mineral oxides.
    High quality clays and minerals have been used for centuries in many cultures for cleansing.  In the past, certain sources of clay were highly prized for their amazingly diverse cleansing effects.

Facial or Body Use: Mix 1 teaspoon of Medi-Detox Pack with purified water (or preferably, Medi-Mineral Serum) to make a paste. Apply to target area for 10 minutes, then rinse off.

Dental Use: Mix ¼ teaspoon of Medi-Detox Pack powder in a plastic (or nonmetallic) container with just enough  purified water to create a thick, paste-like clay ball. Next, place this clay ball inside your mouth and form it around the target area (such as a target tooth or gum area) which you wish to cleanse. Hold the ball in place for 5 to 7 minutes with your finger. Lastly, remove and discard the clay ball. Then rinse your mouth with purified water.

NAME: Medi-Pearl Treatment for Dry Skin Sample, 5ml
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Medi-Pearl DermatoloQi Treatment for DRY SKIN with Pimples and Blackheads
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Medi-Pearl DermatoloQi Treatment for DRY SKIN with Pimples and Blackheads

The Dry Skin Treatment is not just for those with pimples and blackheads, but for people with dry skin or who want an anti-aging treatment. Getting the mix right for dry skin with oily blockages is tricky, as often dryness can be the cause of oil imbalances.

Our unique blend of 8 Chinese herbs and preparation methods provide the ultimate treatment to promote skin healing as well as re-texturization of comedones so they come out easily and new blemishes cease to form. Featuring Astragalosides which can lengthen telomeres, potentiated with other skin nourishing herbs like Ji Xue Cao and Dang Gui this treatment is also anti-aging. Over about 6 weeks, this is an approximate guide of what you can expect for your skin:

Week 1-2: Blackheads start to easily come out as they re-texturize, pimples heal fast. Dry flakes and blemishes seem to heal more rapidly and new softer skin begins to come through underneath. Dry rough skin is becoming soft and plump.

Weeks 3-4: Depending on how many blemishes or blackheads you had to begin with, the prior stage may continue, but you’ll find that less new blemishes form. The pores are staying cleaner. Dryness is becoming moisturized from deeper within the skin and lines and wrinkles appear reduced.

Weeks 5-6: Dryness, blemishes, tendency for pore blockages, fine lines and wrinkles have all reduced.

If your skin continues to form new pimples the cause is most likely an imbalance in your endocrine (hormonal) system or you are having reactions to foods, allergens or toxins in your environment. Please see a qualified practitioner for a customized care plan that is tailored to your unique health needs.

DIRECTIONS: Suitable for use in Acupuncture treatments. See our facial  acupuncture sequences with Bio HerboloQi products on our wholesale site for practitioners. 

EXTERNAL USE ONLY – SHAKE VERY WELL BEFORE USE – Contents settle. We prefer not to use harsh chemicals and the natural contents will settle. You do need to shake or stir well EACH TIME you use this product.

Use 2-3 times per week for 6 weeks. Continue use as needed. You may find you can use it less often for maintenance after the first 6 week course.

APPLY – Gua Sha or massage about 1 teaspoon of treatment into the skin and pores lightly for approximately 5-10 minutes. Then let the treatment soak into your skin for approximately 30 minutes. (Do not gua sha over cystic acne).

STEAM – Drape a warm wet washcloth over your face (or area of application) to steam for 1 minute before wiping the treatment off. You will need to repeat this step 3-4 times. You can extend the steam time to about 10 minutes, which will assist more stubborn blackheads to loosen for removal.

REMOVE – Using the warm wet washcloth wipe the treatment off a 3-4 times. Apply fresh warm water to the cloth each time you steam, then wipe. Don’t use soaps to remove all of the treatment or you will lose a lot of the moisturization benefits that occur in the hours after removing this treatment.

TONE – You can use our Balancing Skin Toner to complete removal of the treatment and encourage pores to close.

MOISTURIZE – For best results apply our Amethyst Hyaluronic first, then our Non Linear Serum Moisturizer after removing your treatment or showering. Do not skip this step or it can work against our treatment’s process. While the treatment is moisturizing, it is not a moisturizer. When you apply moisturizer you continue the process for the active ingredients on your face to be carried further into your skin cells. You will find the final step leaves your skin smoother and more hydrated from within. 

Note: The first two applications of a Medi Pearl treatment may be more drying than the following applications as your skins oil balance restores.

If you have combination skin YES you can combine use of the DRY and OILY skin treatments. You can use each one on different skin areas, or blend them if you think you need a bit of each. For example, if you have an oily T Zone and dry cheeks, we recommend using the Dry treatment on the cheeks and the Oily treatment on the T Zone.  If you have combination skin with no blemishes and want the anti-aging benefits we recommend using the DRY treatment.

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. For further care we recommend Chinese Medicine practitioners.

BONUS VIOLET GLASS: This treatment is packaged in Violet Science Glass, which is the best packaging we can use for products with medicinal oils or active ingredients. Plastics can leach out toxic chemicals when oils are stored in them, and violet glass is able to preserve ingredients for a long time, better than any other color glass. See our FAQ to learn more about Violet Glass and why it is so amazing.

GIFT: We recommend you keep your violet glass container when your treatment runs out. Wash it and reuse it in your kitchen. This dark ultra violet glass appears black but is Violet in the sunlight. It will preserve herbs, spices, culinary leftovers, medicinal potions and more. The retail value of this 200ml violet glass bottle alone is currently around $20. This is our gift for you to keep. The medicine just keeps on going!

NAME: Medi-Soak Cleanse, 2 lbs
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Medi-Soak® is a premier cleansing formula for use as a premier foot soak or whole body soak. It contains four key, premium sources of sea salt minerals including natural salts from the Mediterranean Sea, the Dead Sea, the Hawaiian Islands and ancient inland seas, in addition to premier quality, organic sea vegetation and organic cloves.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Premier Bath Salts Formula with ocean-rich sea vegetation

Medi-Soak® is a premier cleansing formula for use as a premier foot soak or whole body soak. It contains four key, premium sources of sea salt minerals including natural salts from the Mediterranean Sea, the Dead Sea, the Hawaiian Islands and ancient inland seas, in addition to premier quality, organic sea vegetation and organic cloves.

Medi-Soak® offers effective exchange of impurities to cleanse waste particles and promote quantum-state resonance. It contains no added fillers. Due to their natural properties, some of the sea salts may not dissolve completely in your bath water. However, the premier effect generated from these ingredients is still maximally operative.

Foot Bath: Place 1 cup of Medi-Soak® and 8 cups of warm water in a plastic (nonmetallic) container wide enough to place your feet. This 8:1 ratio (water to Medi-Soak®) allows maximum rejuvenation and cleansing of impurities. Briefly swish the contents around in the water with your hand. Some of the mineral crystals will dissolve but not all. Retaining some whole crystals in the bath helps create a benefical cleansing effect. Soak feet for 10 to 20 minutes. Then towel-dry feet. Discard bath water down the drain (do not re-use). For best results, after the bath, spend a few minutes outside to receive beneficial solar radiation.

Target Body Areas: Repeat the procedure above to cleanse other body areas, such as hands, elbows, etc.

Whole Body Bath: Add 2 cups of Medi-Soak® to your bath water. Swish the contents around in the water to dissolve the crystals. Soak in bath for 10 to 20 minutes. Towel-dry your body. Drain bath water through tub drain. Recommended: after the bath, spend a few minutes outside to receive beneficial solar radiation.
INGREDIENTS: Solar-Dried Sea Salt (Ancient Inland Sea) Australian Sea Salt, Dead Sea Salt (Israel), Hawaiian Sea Salt with Red Alaea Clay, Organic Ascophyllum Nodosum (Atlantic Kelp) Frond, Organic Syzgium Aromaticum (Clover) Bud

NAME: MediHoney Wound and Burn Dressing
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Latex Free Calcium Alginate Dressing with Active Leptospermum Honey - Sterile
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
MediHoney Calcium Alginate Dressing is made by Derma Sciences from patented formulations and medical grade honey (Manuka). It is used for moderately to heavily exudating wounds or burn wounds. The products contain 95% active Leptospermum Honey, which has been shown to have several properties which assist in promoting an optimal healing environment for chronic wounds and burns that have not progressed with basic, first line treatments. Through their high osmolarity, the Calcium Alginate helps to cleanse the wound and remove devitalized tissue. MediHoney is designed to manage varying degrees of exudate. This effective wound care product can be used in all stages of wound healing and can also be used as an important component of wound bed preparation.

Product Features & Benefits

  • Wound care for diabetic foot ulcers, arterial leg ulcers, venous stasis leg ulcers, pressure ulcers, 1st and 2nd degree burns and donor sites.
  • Can be used in all stages of wound healing.
  • Helps to lower overall wound pH.
  • Cleanses and Debrides.
  • Provides a moist, occlusive environment conducive to optimal wound healing.
  • As wound exudate is absorbed, a gel forms, making removal easy and without disrupting the wound bed.
CONTRAINDICATIONS: Contraindicated for use on individuals with an allergy to honey, on third-degree burns or to control heavy bleeding.

NAME: Meditation Herbal Soak, 128 oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Immerse yourself in this incredible soak of East Asian herbs that is designed to help you achieve a deeper and more rewarding meditation experience.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Immerse yourself in this incredible soak of East Asian herbs that is designed to help you achieve a deeper and more rewarding meditation experience. Release blocked energy from deep within your body and allow chi to flow optimally throughout your body. This centuries-proven formula will promote mental clarity and focus, while your body becomes deeply relaxed, allowing you to attain a truly meditative state. Feel the difference for yourself!

Key Ingredients:

  • Chinese Clematis Root – Relieves soreness and pain in joints, bones and tendons.
  • Mulberry Root Bark – Aids in relaxation by lowering blood pressure.
  • Stephaniae – Reduces swelling, heat and pain in the joints.

Directions: For an unforgettable experience shake well and pour desired amount of contents into a very warm bath. Fill bath so that the water level falls just below your chest. Immerse yourself in the herb infused water to remove toxins and to calm your mind and body. Relax, breathe deeply and rejuvenate your senses. For best results, remain in bath for at least 20 to 30 minutes, as long as you are comfortable. After bathing, allow the herbal water to remain on your skin and simply pat dry with a towel. Discover the difference for yourself.  Use 2-4 times a week for immediate relief and 2-4 times a month for maintenance.
INGREDIENTS: Herbal Extract: (Licorice Root, Asparagus Tuber, Schisandrae, Angelica, Poria Cocos Astragulus, Folium Perillae, Goji Berry, Mulberry, Sophora, Ginseng, Clematidis, Euphoriae) Green Tea Extract (Camellia Sinensis), Caprylyl Glycol, Natural Lavender Fragrance, Potassium Sorbate, Jade Powder

NAME: Moxa Essence Plus Spray
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: A 1:5 in 25% alcohol tincture extracted from a formulation advanced by Henry Nield, DipOM, BAcC, MRCHM, of England.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
• A 1:5 in 25% alcohol tincture extracted from a formulation advanced by Henry Nield, DipOM, BAcC, MRCHM, of England. The formula consists of five herbs: Folium Artemisiae (Ai Ye, the key ingredient of moxa), Cortex Cinnamomi (Rou Gui), Cortex Eucommiae (Du Zhong), Radix Achyranthis (Niu Xi) and Radix Ligustici (Chuan Xiong).
  • Moxa Essence Plus™ is applied either by sprays or by drops. Warm the area with therapeutic heat sources such as the far infrared therapeutic device FIRARD II™ and FIRARD-3™, a regular heat lamp, or even a hair dryer. A great substitute for either the dry moxa rolls or the stick-on moxa cones. Two sprays or two drops are equivalent to one typical stick-on moxa cone.
  • The Moxa Essence Plus™ does more than just substitute for regular moxa. The formula is also designed for invigorating constitutional deficiency, particularly when it is applied on the back around the meridian points BL23 and BL52.
  • A recommended therapy is to apply two-to-three sprays or two-to-three drops on the targeted area and then treat the area with a therapeutic heating source for approximately 20 minutes. Repeat the application of Moxa Essence Plus™ two or three times during the course of a treatment.
INGREDIENTS: The formula consists of five herbs: Folium Artemisiae (Ai Ye, the key ingredient of moxa), Cortex Cinnamomi (Rou Gui), Cortex Eucommiae (Du Zhong), Radix Achyranthis (Niu Xi) and Radix Ligustici (Chuan Xiong).
PROPERTIES: A 1:5 in 25% alcohol tincture extracted from a formulation advanced by Henry Nield, DipOM, BAcC, MRCHM, of England.

NAME: Mullein Garlic Ear Oil
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Our Mullein Garlic Ear Oil formula provides a natural means for addressing ear pain and infection.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION: Our Mullein Garlic Ear Oil formula provides a natural means for addressing ear pain and infection. The key ingredient, Mullein Flowers, has been known to be a gentle yet effective herbal remedy for centuries. Dioscorides recommended the plant some 2000 years ago, and stories have been passed down of the Egyptians harvesting the plant along the banks of the Nile River. <EOL> <EOL>Mullein flowers have demonstrated antiviral actions as well as being successful in reducing inflammation, softening earwax, stimulating circulation in the ear, and acting as an anodyne to auditory nerves easing irritation and pain in the ear. We combine this remarkable flower with the antimicrobial power of fresh garlic. We extract the medicinal properties of these herbs with organic extra virgin olive oil and add natural vitamin E oil. The combination of these ingredients allow for a wide spectrum of ear problems to be addressed. It may also be used as a preventative for infants, children, or adults prone to chronic ear infections. The oil is a great accompaniment to ear candling. Use of the oil prior to candling softens earwax making the candles more effective. Furthermore, the oil can also be used topically on fungal infections of the skin and ring worm. Our ear oil is gentle enough to be used on children and animals. The sporadic flowering of the mullein plant, the high volume of flowers needed to produce the oil, and the integrity of our solarized extraction make for a tedious and lengthy manufacturing process. These steps, however, are necessary to ensure the product's widely recognized effectiveness.
INGREDIENTS: Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil Mullein Flowers (Verbascum thapsus) Garlic (Allium sativum) Yarrow (Achillea millefolium) Calendula Flowers (Calendula officinalis) Vitamin E All herbs are ethically wildharvested or organically grown

NAME: Mullein Oil Soothing Ear Oil, 2oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Soothing Ear Oil*
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION: Soothing Ear Oil*
INGREDIENTS:
Classic Ear Oil Formula Contains
Mullein flowers (Verbascum thapsus), St. John's wort fresh flowers (Hypericum perforatum), Garlic fresh bulb (Allium sativum) 

Other Ingredients
Certified Organic Olive Oil, Essential Oil of Tea Tree. White Sage and Vitamin E are added as stabilizers.

The Herbal Muscle & Joint Patch™ is a centuries-proven, highly effective formulation that has been used throughout the centuries by East Asian doctors and martial artists.  This formula will act fast to remove toxins, internal bruising, inflammation, and stagnation for optimal healing.*

What to Expect: When wearing the Herbal Muscle & Joint Patch™, you may experience anything from mild warmth to a strong sensation of heat and/or itchiness or redness on the application area. Traditional East Asian herbs are known to speed up the body’s natural healing process. These are common signs of increased chi (energy) and circulation and detoxification. Note: If the heat is too strong, remove the plaster.*

The effects are usually immediate. Depending on the severity of the injury multiple applications may be necessary for optimal healing and results. For chronic injury, several applications of the Muscle & Joint Plaster are necessary to re-harmonize the body.*

Contents: 5 patches

Uses:For the temporary relief of minor aches and pains of muscles & joints associated with: – simple backache –arthritis –strains -bruises –sprains

Directions for adults and children 12 years of age and over:

  • Clean and dry affected area
  • Remove patch from film
  • Apply to affected area not more than 3 to 4 times daily for 7 days
  • Remove patch from skin after at most 8 hours of application

NAME: Narayan Oil, 6oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: AYUSH™ NARAYAN OIL has been used for centuries in Ayurveda, and is one of the most revered of all the Ayurvedic herbal oils. Traditionally, this combination of more than 20 herbs has been used to soothe muscles and joints through massage. Narayan oil is both soothing and rejuvenating.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
AYUSH™ NARAYAN OIL has been used for centuries in Ayurveda, and is one of the most revered of all the Ayurvedic herbal oils. Traditionally, this combination of more than 20 herbs has been used to soothe muscles and joints through massage. Narayan oil is both soothing and rejuvenating.

A member of the Solanaceae family, Withania somnifera has been used for over 4,000 years in India. More commonly known as “Indian ginseng” due to its stimulating effects, it has been used to also calm the mind, relieve weakness and nervous exhaustion, build sexual energy and promote healthy sleep. It has been widely used in immune support, high stress, joint support, thyroid support, cognitive support, hormonal support, and mood stabilization. Overall, Ashwagandha has been revered for its tonifying and longevity promoting effects.

  • Effective in relieving imbalance in the vata dosha
  • Helps to relieve dry skin, joint pain, and muscle soreness
SUB_CATEGORIES: Massage & Bodywork || Topical Formulations >>> Ayurvedic Topicals

DOSAGE: Apply directly after showering and gently towel-dry.
