NAME: Nectar Balm Bee Venom Cream
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: A specially formulated balm for aches and pains, contains 20% NectarEase - Manuka honey with bee venom and a blend of natural ingredients including essential oils.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION: A topical application, Nectar Balm-with Active Manuka Honey and Bee Venom has been developed for external use on aches and pains and bruises. It has a fine, soft texture and is able to be gently massaged into tender areas that may be swollen due to sprains and strains or bruising as well as the arthritic joint.* The combination of Nectar Ease, essential and cold-pressed oils, Nectar Balm is able to be rapidly absorbed into the skin. Initially there was a demand for a topical cream for people who are diabetic or taking medication that excluded them from enjoying the benefits of Nectar Ease. The actual market is much wider. Nectar Balm meets the needs of sports people and those in active occupations that make demands on the muscles, joints and ligaments. It is widely used by people who have very localized arthritic pain and those who occasionally experience "break through" pain, a common occurrence with many arthritic patients. It is a product that should be in everybodys medicine cabinets.* The top quality cream will not dry the skin but rather keeps it moist and acts like a deep heat. A little goes a long way making Nectar Balm a very economical and pleasant way to ease pain.* Whether its a pulled a muscle, tendonitis, repetitive strain injury, or you have overdone it at the gym, on the dance floor or in the garden; or they just ache from a bad nights sleep - reach for Nectar Balm - a bee venom and Manuka honey cream that delivers fast and effective relief.* A 100g pot of Nectar Balm is a must have balm and an essential part of any first-aid kit. The cream is soft and smooth in texture and is easily absorbed: a welcome benefit when massaging tender areas swollen due to sprains, strains, bruising or aching and stiff because of arthritis. Remarkably, it can also relieve the pain of a headache, when applied to the temples or the back of the neck!*
INGREDIENTS: Water, manuka honey, lannet wax, sweet almond oil, olive oil, jojoba oil, bees wax, optiphen plus, ticaxan, rosemary oil, clove oil, eucalyptus oil, bee venom.
DOSAGE: Rub into aching joints as required. Stop using if allergic reaction occurs.

NAME: Neem Oil, 6oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: AYUSH™ NEEM OIL contains Azadirachta indica, an Indian herb known for its cleansing actions and the soothing scents of lavender and peppermint essential oil. Traditionally, this oil has been used for skin care. Neem Oil can be used on both the scalp and the rest of the body.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
AYUSH™ NEEM OIL contains Azadirachta indica, an Indian herb known for its cleansing actions and the soothing scents of lavender and peppermint essential oil. Traditionally, this oil has been used for skin care. Neem Oil can be used on both the scalp and the rest of the body.

The Latin name, Azadirachta indica, for neem is derived from the Arabic language Azadirach-E-Hind, which translates to free growing tree of India. All parts of this evergreen branched tree are highly regarded in Ayurvedic medicine. The young fruits, stem and root bark are astringent, while the fresh twigs are often used to clean teeth. The seed is a stimulant, while the oils and seeds offer antiseptic and insect repellant properties. Neem has been recognized for its use in offering a healthy response to fungus, infection and immune support, is a digestive stimulant for healthy digestion, liver supporting and healthy detoxification, and blood sugar support.

  • Contains Azadirachta indica, an Indian herb known for its cleansing actions
  • Promotes skin health

Guna (Properties): Light
Rasa (Taste): Astringent, bitter
Vipak (Post-Digestive Taste): Pungent
Virya (Energies): Cold
Prabhav (Effects): Kusht roghar and rakat shodhak (promotes healthy skin and wound healing and helps maintains normal blood sugar balance)
SUB_CATEGORIES: Massage & Bodywork || Topical Formulations >>> Ayurvedic Topicals
INGREDIENTS: Standardized extracts of Azadirachta indica, peppermint, and lavender in a sesame oil base.
DOSAGE: Apply to skin and massage gently or as directed by a physician.

NAME: Non Linear Serum Moisturizer Sample, 2ml
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This serum moisturizer contains a proprietary blend of 8 immortal Chinese herbs in multiple extracts and forms, infused into a non-comedogenic moisturizing serum oil base. Featuring 3 different Huang Qi / astragalus extracts, it has potent skin healing and anti-aging medicine.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
This serum moisturizer contains a proprietary blend of 8 immortal Chinese herbs in multiple extracts and forms, infused into a non-comedogenic moisturizing serum oil base. Featuring 3 different Huang Qi / astragalus extracts, it has potent skin healing and anti-aging medicine. Astragaloside IV (four) is known to stimulate telomerase, which acts on the DNA to lengthen telomeres. As our telomeres shorten, we age and the signs of aging such as wrinkles, loss of collagen and degradation occur. Nestled in a powerful combination of 8 immortal Chinese herbs, Non Linear is a nutrient rich skin food. All of the ingredients are certified organic or above these standards when it comes to pesticide residues, heavy metals and other toxins or impurities. This serum is so clean it’s also edible.

Your skin is the largest organ on your body, and it does absorb nearly everything applied to it. That’s why it’s wise to have a serum so clean and natural to the body that it’s edible. One 50ml bottle will last you 4-5 months if you use 2 pumps per day.

 Non Linear contains 3 different Huang Qi extracts, spagyric, C02 and other innovative infusion methods for our 8 immortal herbs, vitamin E from sunflower seeds, hemp seed oil and more:

  • stimulates collagen,
  • skin elasticity,
  • clears redness and age spots,
  • reduces lines and wrinkles,
  • reduces acne and pore size,
  • reduces inflammation,
  • scar healing,
  • nourishing skin to remain healthy and youthful for longer!

DIRECTIONS: Suitable for use in acupuncture treatments. Practitioners see our wholesale site for more information. 

Use as a moisturizer on its own, or after our Amethyst Hyaluronic. 

Apply 1-2 pumps daily for the face and neck.

Apply more if you need to for dry skin, or less as required. Use a similar amount on other skin areas of the same size.

Use Non Linear Serum after our Medi-Pearl DermatoloQi treatments for DRY or OILY skin.

Facial at home skincare steps. Our full facial acupuncture and micro needling sequence for licensed acupuncturists is on our wholesale site. 

  1. Apply one of our Medi-Pearl treatments, for dry or oily skin. More information on how to do the treatments with gua sha is on the Medi Pearl pages. Remove the treatment.
  2. Spritz and finish cleaning with our Balancing Skin Toner. 
  3. Apply Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic Micro 2 while the skin is still damp with skin toner. 
  4. Finish with our Non Linear Serum Moisturizer about 5 minutes after, or as soon as you notice your skin has absorbed most of the Amethyst Herbal Hyaluronic.

 

 These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. For further care we recommend Chinese Medicine practitioners. 

BONUS VIOLET GLASS: This serum is packaged in Violet Science Glass, which is the best packaging we can use for products with medicinal oils or active ingredients. Plastics can leach out toxic chemicals when oils are stored in them, and violet glass is able to preserve ingredients for a long time, better than any other color glass. See our FAQ to learn more about Violet Glass and why it is so amazing.

GIFT: We recommend you keep your violet glass container when your product runs out. Wash it and reuse it in your kitchen. This dark ultra violet glass appears black but is Violet in the sunlight. It will preserve herbs, spices, culinary leftovers, medicinal potions and more. The retail value of the 50ml violet glass bottle alone is currently around $16. This is our gift for you to keep. The medicine just keeps on going!
SUB_CATEGORIES: Beauty, Hair & Skin Care >>> Soap, Scrubs & Sanitation >>> Facial Toner || Topical Formulations >>> Topicals for Cosmetic Acupuncture
INGREDIENTS:
**Black cumin seed oil, *Vitamin E (natural mixed tocopherols from sunflower seeds), **Hemp seed oil, Proprietary blend of *8 Chinese herbs as spagyric alchemicals, distillations, infusions and c02 extracts. Featuring 3 different *Huang Qi extracts for astragaloside IV (astragali radix).

100% Non GMO.
** Certified organic ingredient
* Tested pesticide, heavy metal and contaminant free.

NAME: Non-Cystic Acne Liniment
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Dispels wind, clears heat and resolves toxins; for lung-stomach heat acne.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Dispels wind, clears heat and resolves toxins; for lung-stomach heat acne.

Ku Shen (Radix Sophorae Flavescentis), Da Huang (Radix Et Rhizoma Rhei), Lian Qio (Fructus Forsythiae), Chuan Xin Lian (Herba Andrographitis), Pu Gong Ying (Herba Taraxaci), and Tian Kui Zi (Radix Semiaquilegiae), clear heat nd resolve toxins, disperse swelling and scatter binding. Dan Shen (Radix Salviae Miltiorrhizae), quickens and cools the blood, while Bai Zhi (Radix Dahuricae), resolves the exterior and dries dampness, disperses swelling and expels pus. NAME: Oregano Oil,  0.5 fl oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Premier Oregano Oil features the essential oil of oregano derived from the leaves and flowers of the Oreganum vulgare, the true oregano species. The oil of oregano is high in phenolic compounds such as carvacrol, making this concentrated natural oil very powerful.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Premier Oregano Oil features the essential oil of oregano derived from the leaves and flowers of the Oreganum vulgare, the true oregano species.  Origanum vulgare is a perennial herb and a member of the mint family, lamiaceae, native to Western and Southwestern Eurasia and the Mediterranean region.  The plant grows up to 3 feet high, with dark green leaves and a majestic purple flower.  It can take up to 100lbs of oregano plants to make 1lb of the essential oil of wild oregano.  The oil of oregano is high in phenolic compounds such as carvacrol, making this concentrated natural oil very powerful.

The Greeks and Romans had a profound appreciation for oregano and indigenous cultures have used it since ancient times.  In fact, its name, “Oregano”, comes from the Greek words "oros" and "ganos,” which are words for “mountain” and “joy” — oregano literally means "joy of the mountain."  

Choose only the Best
The nutrient content of oregano as well as its phytochemical properties can vary dramatically, depending on its harvesting and production methods.  We have found many plants are improperly grown and do not offer the full spectrum of benefits typically cited in the scientific literature that we are looking for.

Drying the plant under high heat for long periods of time can affect both strength and composition of the critical phytonutrient compounds in oregano.  The dried flowers and leaves of the wild oregano plant should be harvested when the oil content of the plant is at its highest and should be golden to dark yellow, with a strong spicy odor.

Good quality oregano should exhibit a spicy aroma with an intense taste that may be strong enough to numb the tongue for a few seconds.  Before the preparation of the oil of oregano begins, the scientists in our FDA-inspected lab first authenticate the botanical identity of the oregano (this helps to exclude raw materials that may have been adulterated with the wrong species or other look-alike herbs such as marjoram or thyme).

Next, our scientists complete an in-depth phytoforensic screening where we inspect for undesirable inorganic materials such as herbicides and pesticides.  Our PRL quality guarantee ensures that our oil of oregano meets or exceeds FDA requirements for identity, purity, strength, composition while testing for contaminates such as heavy metals (including arsenic, mercury, cadmium and lead), residual solvents in extracts and pathogenic microbiology. The raw materials in this product have not been solvent- extracted or heat damaged.

Feeling great on a regular basis is not just a “given” any more – you have to work for it.  We recommend that you take action to transform yourself so you can live your life to the fullest.  Adding Premier Oregano Oil to your daily nutrition regimen is a winning solution.
INGREDIENTS:
Five Drops Provide:

Carvacrol . . .18 mg
(from Oregano Essential Oil [leaf] [Origanum vulgare])

Other Ingredients: Extra Virgin Olive Oil
DOSAGE: Take 5 drops, twice daily in 2 oz. of water or with food. Feeling a heat sensation after use is normal. Avoid contact with eyes or genitals. Keep tightly capped between uses to avoid evaporation of essential oils.

Elevate your sun care routine with the confidence of uncompromising protection and care. Our 100% Zinc Oxide Broad Spectrum SPF 35 combines a biodegradable, non-toxic formula with powerful sun defense, making it an essential companion for active outdoor enthusiasts. Discover the array of benefits that make our sunscreen a superior choice for all skin types:

How to Use

Apply Liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. If swimming or sweating, reapply immediately after towel drying and at least every 2 hours.

Benefits

Broad Spectrum Protection: Shield your skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays with our advanced broad spectrum formula. Ensure your skin is safeguarded against the sun's damaging effects, reducing the risk of premature aging and sunburn.

100% Zinc Oxide: Our sunscreen harnesses the natural power of 100% Zinc Oxide as a mineral barrier, forming a protective shield on your skin's surface. Experience a physical barrier that reflects and scatters harmful UV rays.

Biodegradable Formula: eco-conscious sun care with our biodegradable formula that prioritizes environmental responsibility. It breaks down naturally without harming delicate ecosystems, minimizing your ecological footprint.

Non-Toxic Assurance: Revel in worry-free sun protection with our non-toxic formulation. You can confidently apply our sunscreen, knowing it's free from harmful chemicals, making it safe for you and the environment.

Reef and River Safe: Choose a sunscreen that respects aquatic ecosystems. Our reef and river safe formula is designed to have minimal impact on marine life, allowing you to enjoy the water without compromising the delicate balance of nature.

Perfect for Active Lifestyles: Whether you're hiking, biking, or participating in outdoor sports, our sunscreen is tailored for active individuals who demand reliable and enduring sun protection.

Suitable for All Skin Types: Experience universal skin compatibility. Our sunscreen is thoughtfully formulated to cater to all skin types, ensuring that everyone can enjoy its benefits.

Nourishing Skin Care: Beyond sun protection, our formula is enriched with skin-loving ingredients that offer nourishment and hydration. Enjoy a dual-purpose product that cares for your skin while shielding it from the sun.

Ease of Application: Experience smooth and effortless application. Our sunscreen glides on evenly, leaving no sticky residue and providing comfortable, breathable coverage.

Prevent Premature Aging: Shielding your skin from the sun's harmful rays can help prevent premature aging, maintaining your skin's youthful appearance for years to come.

If you can't eat it, why put it on your skin?

Here at Peak Scents, we live by the principle - If you can't eat it, why put it on your skin? Did you know that the skin is our largest organ? What gets absorbed into our skin potentially effects all of our body systems.

Here's how you can trust that our products will give you desired results without sacrificing quality:

food-grade preservatives only

We use food-grade preservatives only, never scary chemical preservatives, and we never use chemical emulsifiers, fragrances or alcohol.

High Quality Ingredients

We source cold-pressed, raw, organic oils, as well as high-quality, non-gmo, organic vitamins and extracts.

organic or wildcrafted herbs

We infuse our organic or wildcrafted herbs in Sunflower, Grapeseed, or Olive oil, using the slow method - no heat - to ensure that all of the nutrients are alive and potent.

At Peak Scents, we never outsource production because it allows us to guarantee that our products have the integrity our customers expect. We are committed to sourcing our ingredients through partners who share an aligned dedication to responsible practices. We are passionate about creating sustainable change in the world through intelligent, ethical business customs. Our commitment to never outsource production ensures that when you choose us as, you can trust the products you receive will adhere to those same ideals.

NAME: Organic Cactus Seed Oil Antioxidant Facial Serum
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Cactus seed oil is a rare, precious oil that is cold-pressed from the seeds of species of prickly pear cactus native to North Africa. Used as a potent, high-performance facial serum, it is now considered in Europe the ultimate panacea for preventing and reversing premature skin aging.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Cactus seed oil is a rare, precious oil that is cold-pressed from the seeds of species of prickly pear cactus native to North Africa. Used as a potent, high-performance facial serum, it is now considered in Europe the ultimate panacea for preventing and reversing premature skin aging.

Its extremely high levels of phytosterols, tocopherols (natural vitamin E) and polyunsaturated essential fatty acids (mostly omega-6s) together make Cactus seed oil highly nutritive, emollient, protective, regenerative and toning to the skin. Its nutrients penetrate rapidly and deeply into the deepest layers of the epidermis, resulting in a serum that is extraordinarily antioxidant and rejuvenating to the skin.

Specific actions:
• Deeply nourishes, moistens and softens the skin to improve skin moisture,
   hydration and elasticity
• Treats dry, rough or unstructured skin
• Confers tone and firmness to the skin
• Regenerates the skin and slows down its aging process, thereby preventing
   wrinkles
• Increases the skin’s resistance to environmental pollution as well as to climatic
   dryness and heat

Our Cactus seed oil is expeller pressed in the artisan way by a Berber women's coop in the Moroccan Sahara desert. It is virgin cold-pressed in the traditional artisan manner and certified organic.

Directions: After cleansing, mist with a hydrosol to tone and moisturize. With the skin barely dry, massage 2-3 drops of Cactus seed oil into those facial areas needing treatment twice daily; especially around the eyes, lips and any areas with wrinkles. Cactus seed oil can also be mixed in with Argan Oil Facial Serum, as well day and night creams. Like argan oil itself, it can also be used directly for treating split ends and broken nails, scar tissue and fissures.

NAME: Outch Kinesio Tape, Black
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Outch Tape is a kinesiology tape that is pre-cut for quick and easy application. Outch Tape has rounded corners to prevent peeling, and hypo-allergenic adhesive to keep a firm application without irritation. Outch Tape is also water-resistant, which means you can enjoy your bath or shower for days without concern!
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Outch Tape is a kinesiology tape that is pre-cut for quick and easy application. Outch Tape has rounded corners to prevent peeling, and hypo-allergenic adhesive to keep a firm application without irritation. Outch Tape is also water-resistant, which means you can enjoy your bath or shower for days without concern!

So, what exactly is kinesiology tape? Maybe you’ve seen athletes wearing it before, but you’re not sure of it’s exact purpose. Kinesiology tape is a type of therapeutic tape that, when applied strategically to areas of the body such as shoulders, knees, abs, or the back, provides much-needed support during physical activity and reduces pain. This tape is also extremely flexible, meaning it can match your full range of motion during exercise.

Outch Tape is designed to:

  • Increase Circulation
  • Reduce Swelling
  • Relieve Pain
  • Increase Mobility
  • Enhance Recovery
  • Pair well with all other Outch products to help stop pain!

For an even better performance boost, we recommend pairing Outch Tape with their pain relieving ointments. Available in both salve and roll-on gel forms, Outch Ointment is a pain relief ointment created with a combination of organic H. extract and ancient Chinese medicinal herbs. Apply it on the spot for relief from muscle soreness, improved circulation, and reduced inflammation.

Whether you want to achieve better athletic performance or relief from chronic aches and pains, Outch can help! Try it today to experience the healing power of nature for yourself.

NAME: Power Repair Face Cream, 1.75oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Our Power Repair Face Cream combines an impressive array of high-potency antioxidants with nourishing ingredients for a truly indulgent skincare experience.  <EOL>
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Our Power Repair Face Cream combines an impressive array of high-potency antioxidants with nourishing ingredients for a truly indulgent skincare experience. With ingredients such as green tea, grape seed oil, vitamins C & E, alpha-lipoic acid, and CoQ10, this cream delivers a powerhouse combination to rejuvenate your skin. 

The powerful antioxidants in our face cream have been scientifically proven to firm and tighten the skin, visibly reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. They also help protect your skin from the damaging effects of the sun, promoting a radiant complexion.

While you might expect a hefty price tag for a product with such potent ingredients, we've made it surprisingly affordable! 

How to Use

Massage a small amount to the face and neck after cleansing. Apply up to three times a day. For best results use our Power Repair Toner before application. Apply cream, then follow up with Power Repair Face Mist. These steps will help with absorption and hydration.

Benefits

- Brightens*
- Generates firmness and elasticity*
-Improves fine lines and wrinkles*
- Reduces redness and irritation*
- Improves dry skin and rough patches*
- Decreases Spots and uneven skin*
- Beegan *

If you can't eat it, why put it on your skin?

Here at Peak Scents, we live by the principle - If you can't eat it, why put it on your skin? Did you know that the skin is our largest organ? What gets absorbed into our skin potentially effects all of our body systems.

Here's how you can trust that our products will give you desired results without sacrificing quality:

food-grade preservatives only

We use food-grade preservatives only, never scary chemical preservatives, and we never use chemical emulsifiers, fragrances or alcohol.

High Quality Ingredients

We source cold-pressed, raw, organic oils, as well as high-quality, non-gmo, organic vitamins and extracts.

organic or wildcrafted herbs

We infuse our organic or wildcrafted herbs in Sunflower, Grapeseed, or Olive oil, using the slow method - no heat - to ensure that all of the nutrients are alive and potent.

At Peak Scents, we never outsource production because it allows us to guarantee that our products have the integrity our customers expect. We are committed to sourcing our ingredients through partners who share an aligned dedication to responsible practices. We are passionate about creating sustainable change in the world through intelligent, ethical business customs. Our commitment to never outsource production ensures that when you choose us as, you can trust the products you receive will adhere to those same ideals.
INGREDIENTS: Water (purified), organic plant infused oil of green tea and horsetail, olive oil, grapeseed oil, coconut oil, beeswax. shea butter, vitamin C ester, jojoba oil, tocotrienols (vitamin E), alpha lipoic acid, coenzyme Q-10, DMAE, buffered calcium, pure essential oils of lavandin grosso, geranium, and ylang ylang, lecithin, glucose, and enzyme.

NAME: Power Repair Hyaluronic + C Serum, 1oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Power Repair Hyaluronic +C Serum is a multi-tasking serum that delivers long lasting hydration, boosts collagen production and protects skin from damage, while improving tone and texture.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Our exceptional multi-tasking serum is designed to provide numerous benefits for your skin. Enriched with a potent 15% concentration of vitamin C ester, hyaluronic acid, and a collection of powerful antioxidants, it offers a comprehensive approach to skincare.

Vitamin C ester is a key ingredient in this serum, known for its brightening and antioxidant properties. With a 15% concentration, it helps even out skin tone, diminish the appearance of dark spots, and promote a more radiant complexion. Vitamin C ester also aids in collagen production, which can improve the skin's firmness and elasticity.

Hyaluronic acid is another important component, renowned for its moisturizing abilities. It acts as a humectant, attracting and retaining moisture in the skin, resulting in improved hydration and a plumper appearance. By maintaining optimal hydration levels, hyaluronic acid helps to support a healthy skin barrier.

The collection of potent antioxidants in our serum works together to protect your skin from the damaging effects of free radicals and environmental stressors. Free radicals are unstable molecules that can contribute to premature aging and skin damage. Antioxidants help neutralize these free radicals, reducing their harmful impact and promoting a healthier complexion.

How to Use

Start with a clean face: Wash your face with a gentle cleanser and pat it dry. Ensure that your skin is free from dirt, oil, and makeup residue.

Dispense a dime-sized amount onto your fingertips or the palm of your hand. A dime-sized amount is generally sufficient to cover your face and neck.

Apply to face and neck: Gently massage the serum onto your face and neck using upward motions. Start from the center of your face and work your way outward. Be sure to cover the entire surface area, including your forehead, cheeks, nose, chin, and neck.

Allow it to absorb: Give the serum a few moments to fully absorb into your skin. You may notice a slight tingling sensation, which is normal and temporary.

Follow up with moisturizer: After the serum has absorbed, you can apply your facial oil and/or face cream. This step helps lock in the moisture and provides additional hydration to your skin.

Morning and night application: For optimal results, it is recommended to use the serum both in the morning and at night. This helps maintain a consistent supply of vitamin C to your skin throughout the day.

Sunscreen application: During the daytime, it's crucial to follow up with a broad-spectrum sunscreen with an SPF of 30 or higher.

Benefits

Deep Hydration: Hyaluronic acid is a powerful humectant that can hold up to 1,000 times its weight in water, making it highly effective in hydrating the skin. When combined with vitamin C, it enhances the moisturizing properties, leaving your skin deeply hydrated and plump.

Skin Firming and Tightening: The combination of hyaluronic acid and vitamin C stimulates collagen production, which helps improve skin elasticity and firmness. Regular use of the serum can contribute to a more youthful and toned appearance, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

Brightens and Evens Skin Tone: Vitamin C is renowned for its brightening properties. When paired with hyaluronic acid, it helps fade dark spots, hyperpigmentation, and uneven skin tone. The serum promotes a more radiant complexion, giving your skin a healthy and vibrant glow.

Antioxidant Protection: Vitamin C + E, Ferulic Acid and Alpha Lipoic are potent antioxidants that help neutralize free radicals, which are harmful molecules that can damage the skin and accelerate the aging process. By protecting against oxidative stress, the serum aids in maintaining the overall health and vitality of your skin.

Enhances Skin's Natural Barrier: Hyaluronic acid and vitamin C both support the skin's natural barrier function. They help strengthen the protective layer of the skin, preventing moisture loss and shielding it from environmental aggressors such as pollution and UV radiation.

Suitable for All Skin Types: The hyaluronic acid and vitamin C serum is suitable for all skin types, including dry, oily, combination, and sensitive skin. Its lightweight and non-greasy formula absorbs quickly, providing nourishment without clogging pores or causing irritation.

Promotes a Youthful Appearance: Regular use of the serum can help promote a more youthful appearance by improving skin texture, reducing the signs of aging, and enhancing overall skin health. It can be a valuable addition to your skincare routine in maintaining a radiant and revitalized complexion.

Our Power Repair Facial Oil—an exceptional skincare elixir that combines the potency of powerful botanical oils and antioxidants to rejuvenate and nourish your skin. This luxurious facial oil is formulated to address multiple skin concerns and provide transformative results. 

How to Use

Shake well before use. Pump 1 to 2 drops of oil into palm and apply to face & neck. Use morning and night. *Store in a cool and dry place after opening*

Benefits

It provides intense hydration, replenishing the skin's moisture barrier and leaving it soft, supple, and radiant.

-Soothing and Calming: Our carefully selected blend of botanical oils includes ingredients known for their soothing and calming properties. It can help alleviate redness, irritation, and inflammation, making it suitable for sensitive skin.

-Versatile Application: The lightweight texture of our facial oil allows for easy absorption and can be used alone or in combination with other skincare products. It can be applied in the morning or evening, providing a nourishing boost to your skincare routine.

NAME: Power Repair Vitamin C Solution, 1oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Experience the transformative power of our Vitamin C Solution, an advanced oil-free treatment that combines a super blend of antioxidants with a potent 15% concentration of Vitamin C.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Experience the transformative power of our Vitamin C Solution, an advanced oil-free treatment that combines a super blend of antioxidants with a potent 15% concentration of Vitamin C. This unique formulation tightens, lifts, and revitalizes your skin, while effectively boosting collagen production and enhancing firmness. By harnessing the synergistic effects of powerful antioxidants and Vitamin C, our solution promotes a more vibrant complexion, leaving your skin visibly rejuvenated and radiant. Follow with our Power Repair Serum or Face Cream for best results.

How to Use

On a clean face, massage 5-10 drops over face and neck until fully absorbed. Apply morning and night. Follow with our Power Repair Skin Serum or Face Cream.
Always shake bottle first
*Store in a cool place after opening*

Benefits

-Antioxidant Protection: neutralizes free radicals, which are unstable molecules that can damage the skin cells. By reducing oxidative stress, our Vitamin C Solution protects the skin from environmental pollutants, UV radiation, and other sources of oxidative damage.

-Collagen Production: Vitamin C plays a crucial role in collagen synthesis, a protein that provides structural support to the skin. By promoting collagen production, vitamin C helps improve skin elasticity, firmness, and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

-Brightening and Even Skin Tone: Vitamin C has skin brightening properties. It inhibits the production of melanin, the pigment responsible for dark spots and hyperpigmentation. Regular use of our Vitamin C Solution can help fade dark spots, even out skin tone, and promote a more radiant complexion.

-Sun Damage Repair: repairs damage caused by sun exposure. It can reduce the appearance of sunspots, minimize redness and inflammation, and promote the healing of sunburns.

-Protection Against UV Damage: Although vitamin C cannot replace sunscreen, it can provide some additional protection against the harmful effects of UV radiation. It helps neutralize free radicals generated by UV exposure and minimizes the potential damage caused by UV rays.

-Anti-Inflammatory Properties: making it beneficial for individuals with inflammatory skin conditions like acne, rosacea, or eczema. It can help reduce redness, calm the skin, and alleviate inflammation

SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Pure Magnesium Flakes are highly-concentrated crystals of magnesium chloride sourced from the Ancient Zechstein Seabed in the Netherlands.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Pure Magnesium Flakes are highly-concentrated crystals of magnesium chloride sourced from the Ancient Zechstein Seabed in the Netherlands – nothing added and nothing removed. The magnesium flakes are harvested from the seabed which is 1,600 to 2,000 meters beneath the surface of the earth. Refresh your body and mind by using Pure Magnesium Flakes in a full bath or foot soak.

One cup of flakes contains approximately 51 grams of magnesium chloride, and numerous natural occurring trace elements from ancient seawater.

Suggested Use

For relaxing your body and mind, it is recommended to add 1-2 cups (8-16 ounces) or more in the bathtub or footbath, and soak for a minimum of 20 minutes. Note: The temperature of magnesium bath should be warm (101 F to 105 F) rather than hot. When you add the flakes to warm bath water, your skin will feel the results more effectively.

NAME: Purple Cloud Shiunko Ointment, 1/2oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Also called Shiunko in Japan, this product was developed by Seishu Hanaoka, a famous surgeon in the late Edo period. The ointment is useful for a variety of purposes.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Zi Yun Gao (Purple Cloud Ointment)

Also called Shiunko in Japan, this product was developed by Seishu Hanaoka, a famous surgeon in the late Edo period. The ointment is useful for a variety of purposes.

Shiunko Ointment is a traditional Japanese remedy used in moxibustion therapy, mainly used as a protective barrier between the skin and burning moxa. Created from an array of all natural ingredients, Shiunko Ointment can also be used to sooth minor topical burns, including wind burn on lips, and calm the effects of eczema and psoriasis.

NAME: Rapid Pain Relief Balm Sample, 5ml
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Rapid Pain Relief is for pain caused by blood stagnation. Excellent for clearing menstrual pain, headaches, chronic back and shoulder pain, injuries, bruises, post workout burn and more.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Rapid Pain Relief is a balm for pain caused by blood stagnation. The formula consists of premium herbal oils and C02 extracts that move blood and relieve pain. When used for pain caused by blood stagnation, this balm can work in as little as 60 seconds. It is excellent for:

  • Menstrual pain,
  • Headaches or migraines,
  • Pain after injury where skin is unbroken,
  • Chronic back and shoulder pain due to lack of fluid flow or poor posture causing lack of flow,
  • Bruises,
  • Post workout burn,
  • and more where blood stagnation is the cause.

Chinese herbal oils, essential oils and C02 extracts have been combined with skin nourishing butters. All ingredients are organic where possible. 

The skin nourishing butters we use feel amazing on your skin. Our unique balm base is non-greasy, antibacterial, anti-inflammatory, anti-aging, high in Vit A, E, and many other skin food nutrients.

  • Cacao Butter
  • Ucuuba Butter
  • Mango Butter
  • Active oils include Chuan Xiong, Mo Yao (myrrh), Mei Gui Hua (rose), basil linalool, lavender, clary sage and more.

DIRECTIONS: Apply approximately 1/4 teaspoon to the site of pain. This is enough for an area the size of your two hands. You can also apply a small finger dab to acupoints, or small bruises. We recommend waiting a few minutes before using more as this product is quite effective and potent. Smelling the ointment can also help, especially when the pain is at shoulder level or above, like with a headache.

For period pain: apply to the lower abdomen when pain commences, or just prior to when pain is due if it is a consistent pattern.

For headaches or migraines: apply to the neck and shoulder area first. There is usually no need to apply to the scalp. Be careful of your eyes if you apply it to your temples. We recommend putting it back near the hairline.

EXTERNAL USE ONLY.

AVOID:  Applying it close to the eyes, mouth, or other orifices. It may sting and cause irritation.

These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. For further care we recommend Chinese medicine practitioners.

BONUS VIOLET GLASS: This balm is packaged in Violet Science Glass, which is the best packaging we can use for products with medicinal oils or active ingredients. Plastics can leach out toxic chemicals when oils are stored in them, and violet glass is able to preserve ingredients for a long time, better than any other color glass. See our FAQ to learn more about Violet Glass and why it is so amazing.

GIFT: We recommend you keep your violet glass container when your balm runs out. Wash it and reuse it in your kitchen. This dark ultra violet glass appears black but is Violet in the sunlight. It will preserve herbs, spices, culinary leftovers, medicinal potions and more. The retail value of this 1oz violet glass jar alone is currently around $15. This is our gift for you to keep. The medicine just keeps on going!
INGREDIENTS:
**≠Cacao butter, **Ucuuba Butter, **Mango Butter, **Basil linalool oil, **Lavender oil, *Chuan Xiong C02 extract (ligustici wallicci rhizoma), **Mo Yao C02 extract (myrrh), **Clary Sage oil, **Juniper Berry oil, *Mei Gui Hua oil (rose).

** Certified Organic ingredient.
* Ingredient tested for pesticide residues. 
≠ Fair Trade ingredient.

Wrap your skin in a blanket of relief with ReDermaVive by People's Herbs Red Rescue & Renew. This formula is designed to first rescue the skin, then encourage skin renewal. The herbal base specifically addresses redness and sensitive, dry, chapped, and slightly scarred skin.

Dragon’s blood is a natural plant resin extracted from the dragon tree, which works to soothe skin and support the skin’s protective barrier.  It boosts hydration for a plumping effect and contains taspione, a natural agent, that supports the production of collagen.

Red Rescue & Renew's naturally reddish-brown tint comes from herbs and oils such as arnebia, safflower, sea buckthorn, and dragon’s blood, which instantaneously creates the appearance of a more even skin tone.  

  • Dragon's blood resin boosts hydration for a plumping effect, helps lock in moisture to protect the skin's barrier, and supports the production of collagen.
  • The herbal formula in Red Rescue & Renew helps to reduce the appearance of redness in the skin.

NAME: Resolve Damp & Move Lymph Balm Sample, 5ml
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Resolve Damp, Phlegm and Move Lymph is a balm for assisting the body to resolve damp, and transform phlegm via the Tai Yin channels and lymphatic system. The formula consists of premium herbal oils and C02 extracts that help to move the lymphatic fluids and decongest damp or phlegm. It is also good for harmonizing Earth Qi when invaded by Wood Qi, causing an overthinking type of anxiety.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Resolve Damp, Phlegm and Move Lymph is a balm for assisting the body to resolve damp, and transform phlegm via the Tai Yin channels and lymphatic system. The formula consists of premium herbal oils and C02 extracts that help to move the lymphatic fluids and decongest damp or phlegm. It is also good for harmonizing Earth Qi when invaded by Wood Qi, causing an overthinking type of anxiety. It is excellent for:

  • Spleen deficiency damp
  • Heavy limbs or sensation of heavy tiredness
  • Spleen rumination, anxiety, worry and overthinking,
  • Tendency for phlegm, hayfever and sinus allergies,
  • Lymphatic cleansing support product
  • Maintaining healthy lymphocyte levels
  • Detoxification support product.
  • Use in massage for phlegm stagnations and blockages,

Chinese herbal oils, essential oils and C02 extracts have been combined with skin nourishing butters. All ingredients are organic where possible. 

The skin nourishing butters we use feel amazing on your skin. Our unique balm base is non-greasy, antibacterial, anti-inflammatory, anti-aging, high in Vit A, E, and many other skin food nutrients.

  • Cacao Butter
  • Ucuuba Butter
  • Mango Butter
  • Active oils include Sheng Jiang oil (ginger), Xiao hui Xiang oil (fennel), Basil linalool and our special lymph cleansing citrus and mint blend.

DIRECTIONS: Apply approximately 1/4 teaspoon to the upper chest, abdomen, inner arms, or along lymph vessels. You can also apply this to acupoints along the spleen and lung channels, and those that resolve damp and transform phlegm like ST40. 1/4 teaspoon is enough for an area the size of your two hands. You can also apply a small finger dab to acupoints like the auricular point, Shen Men, or earth points along the HT and PC channels.

For overthinking and worry apply along the inner arm and wrist area. Also smelling this balm can help with spleen rumination, overthinking or worry.

For Sinus, hayfever or phlegm congestion in the respiratory system, apply this one to the lymph channels, or torso over lungs, spleen and belly to assist your body in resolving the phlegm and decongesting system.

EXTERNAL USE ONLY. NOT SUITABLE FOR USE DURING PREGNANCY. 

AVOID:  Applying it close to the eyes, mouth, or other orifices. It may sting and cause irritation.

These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. For further care we recommend Chinese medicine practitioners.

BONUS VIOLET GLASS: This balm is packaged in Violet Science Glass, which is the best packaging we can use for products with medicinal oils or active ingredients. Plastics can leach out toxic chemicals when oils are stored in them, and violet glass is able to preserve ingredients for a long time, better than any other color glass. See our FAQ to learn more about Violet Glass and why it is so amazing.

GIFT: We recommend you keep your violet glass container when your balm runs out. Wash it and reuse it in your kitchen. This dark ultra violet glass appears black but is violet in the sunlight. It will preserve herbs, spices, culinary leftovers, medicinal potions and more. The retail value of the 1 oz /30ml violet glass jar alone is currently around $15. This is our gift for you to keep. The medicine just keeps on going!
INGREDIENTS:
**≠Cacao butter, **Ucuuba Butter, **Mango Butter, **Gan Jiang oil (ginger), **Xiao Hui Xiang oil (fennel), **Lemon oil, **Lemongrass oil, **Grapefruit oil, **Spearmint oil, ** Basil linalool oil.

**Certified Organic ingredient.
* Ingredient tested for pesticide residues. 
≠ Fair Trade ingredient.

DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
ASAP OTC™ is a water-based hydro gel for use in moist wound care management. The gel may inhibit growth of microorganisms within the dressing.

ASAP OTC™ has been evaluated in standard tests that show it can reduce the levels of common microorganisms including: Staphylococcus aureus, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Escherichia coli, MRSA and VRE, as well as fungi such as Candida albicans and Aspergillus niger.

INDICATIONS FOR USE
For topical management of:

  • Minor Cuts
  • Lacerations
  • Abrasions
  • 1st and 2nd Degree Burns
  • Skin Irritations


Some things that may cause 1st and 2nd degree burns are:

  • Laser Therapy

  • Blemish Removal

Some things that may cause abrasions are:

  • Dermabrasion
  • Exfoliation
  • Body Scrub
  • Facials

Some things that may cause minor cuts are:

  • Permanent Makeup
  • Haircut

NAME: Silver Wound Dressing Gel, Large
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: 32ppm - CareStat Wound Dressing Gel is a water-based gel wound dressing for use in moist wound care management. CareStat wound Dressing Gel contains silver that may help inhibit the growth of microorganisms within the dressing. CareStat Wound Dressing Gel has been evaluated in standard tests that show it can reduce the levels of common micro-organisms including Staphylococcus aureus, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Escherichia coli, Candida albicans Aspergillus niger.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
areSTAT® Wound Dressing Gel is a water- based hydro gel wound dressing for use in moist wound care management. CareSTATÂ® Wound Dressing Gel contains silver that may help inhibit the growth of microorganisms within the dressing.

CareSTAT® Wound Dressing Gel has been evaluated in standards tests that show it can reduce the levels of common microorganisms including Staphylococcus aureus, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Escherichia coli, Candida albicans and aspergillus niger. (USP <51>).

INDICATIONS FOR USE
For topical management of:

  • Minor Cuts
  • Lacerations
  • Abrasions
  • 1st and 2nd Degree Burns
  • Skin Irritations

DIRECTIONS FOR USE

  1. Wash your hands with soap and water before touching the wound.
  2. Carefully clean the wound using soap and water or an appropriate commercial brand of wound cleanser.
  3. Dispense CareSTATÂ® Wound Dressing Gel onto an appropriate clean applicator (such as a tongue depressor or gauze) in a sufficient amount to liberally cover the wound. Cover the gel with an appropriate secondary dressing cover such as a gauze bolster, dressing wrap, film or non-woven adhesive secondary dressing.

CHANGING THE DRESSING

  1. Carefully remove the secondary dressing from the wound.
  2. Residual CareSTAT® Wound Dressing Gel may be removed with the cover dressing.
  3. Follow instructions above to re-apply the gel.

FREQUENCY OF CHANGE
CareSTAT® Wound Dressing Gel should normally be changed every 24 to 72 hours, but the frequency will depend on the type and condition of the wound.

PRECAUTIONS

  1. Consult with a healthcare professional if you have any concerns or questions about the wound.
  2. Be alert for signs of wound infection. These can include:
    • Pus or cloudy fluid draining from the wound
    • Increased redness around the wound
    • Wound has become extremely tender
    • Increased Pain or swelling 48 hours after the wound occurred
    • Onset of fever
    • Wound has not healed within 10 days from the date of the injury.
  3. CareSTAT® Wound Dressing Gel is designed for use on any part of the body except for oral and ophthalmic use. Consult a healthcare professional before using the gel in any other manner.

STORAGE Store at room temperature.
SUB_CATEGORIES: Massage & Bodywork || Topical Formulations >>> Colloidal Topicals
INGREDIENTS: 32 PPM Proprietary Silver (purified water, nano-silver at .01 micron), Proplene Glycol, Triethanolamine, Carbomer.
DOSAGE: Clean wound. Use clean applicator to liberally cover the wound with CareStat Wound Dressing Gel and secondary dressing.. See enclosed package insert for comploete use information.

  • Contains 30ppm Colloidal Nano Particles of Silver suspended in our proprietary formula.
  • Silver supports healthy skin and coats.
  • Nexderma's Silvet Shampoo soothes the skin on contact & speeds animal healing time without compromising or interfering with pre-existing treatments or medications.
  • No stinging or discoloration to the skin.
  • Safe to use around the eyes and mouth.
  • Contains no parabens or chemical dyes.
  • Animal cruelty free.
Directions:
For best results, brush coat thoroughly prior to bathing to remove loose fur and dander.  Apply several handfuls to wet coat and lather entire body from front to back.  Leave on for 5 minutes for best results.  Rinse thoroughly until the water runs clear and there are no additional suds.

NAME: Silvet Spray, 100ml
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: 30PPM- Silvet is a unique silver spray made from colloidal nanoparticles of silver suspended in ultra pure water. Historically, silver has been known to support healthy skin, hair, and overall wellness. In animals, it can be used to manage skin conditions and chronic wounds that are responsive to this natural treatment. Silvet Spray provides in fighting against gram-positive and gram-negative bacteria, fungi and yeast.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
• Colloidal nanoparticles of silver.
  • All natural, no stinging or discoloration to skin or fabrics.
  • Can be used as a cleanser and is great for ulcerated wounds.
  • A consistent measure of 30 ppm is administered with each application without requiring to shake the product.
  • Has been shown to aid in treatment of skin irritations, wounds, fungus, hot spots, burns, abscesses, sores, thrush, rain rot, and more.

Silvet is a unique silver spray made from colloidal nanoparticles of silver suspended in ultra pure water. Historically, silver has been known to support healthy skin, hair, and overall wellness. In animals, it can be used to manage skin conditions and chronic wounds that are responsive to this natural treatment. Silvet Spray provides in fighting against gram-positive and gram-negative bacteria, fungi and yeast.

The benefits of silver have been utilized since ancient times providing remedies for heart conditions, ulcers, epilepsy, and even as a common household preservative prior to the invention of the refrigerator. The antibacterial properties naturally found in silver were successful in both eliminating the preexisting bacteria and blocking any further bacterial growth. This treatment was so popular because it allowed the wounds to heal intuitively without being delayed or interrupted by synthetic antibiotics, steroids or hormones that are routinely found in modern topicals today.

Directions for use: Treat affected area 2-3 times daily or as directed by your veterinarian. Spray affected areas thoroughly. Allow area to dry before animal can lick.

Warning: For topical use on dogs, cats, and horses. Keep out of direct sunlight and store at room temperature. Keep out of reach of children.

Available through licensed veterinarians.

Colloidal nanoparticles of silver have been isolated and impregnated into a suspension allowing consistent levels of application to the site without requiring to shake the product. This will donate an even measure of 30 parts per million into the wound bed which is an accepted level of donation. The colloidal nanoparticles of silver have the capacity to destroy the bacteria's outer cell membrane as well as the inner components by directly binding to the bacterial DNA to further halt cell respiration at the source. It is through these actions that cause the treatment to be bactericidal - or, preventing the growth of bacteria. Recent research has shown no toxic effect due to the presence of colloidal nanoparticles of silver. It has been shown to reduce bacteria, viruses and fungal growths in both acute and chronic wounds.
SUB_CATEGORIES: Massage & Bodywork || Topical Formulations >>> Colloidal Topicals
CONTRAINDICATIONS: Allergies to silver.

NAME: Skin Rejuvenation Soak, 128 oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: For centuries, East Asian royalty have used this formula to rejuvenate and nourish the skin, enhance firmness and tone, reduce the appearance of blemishes and age spots, and improve overall skin quality. Feel the difference for yourself!
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Immerse yourself in this infusion of East Asian herbs and discover the secret to youthful looking skin. For centuries, East Asian royalty have used this formula to rejuvenate and nourish the skin, enhance firmness and tone, reduce the appearance of blemishes and age spots, and improve overall skin quality. Feel the difference for yourself!

Key Ingredients:

  • Licorice Root – An effective anti-inflammatory that detoxifies and removes impurities from skin. Protects the skin by defending against the negative effects of sun damage
  • Comfrey – Promotes healing while soothing and regenerating the skin.
  • Mulberry – Anti-bacterial properties that purify, decongest, and detoxify the skin.

Directions: For an unforgettable experience shake well and pour desired amount of contents into a very warm bath. Fill bath so that the water level falls just below your chest. Immerse yourself in the herb infused water to remove toxins and to calm your mind and body. Relax, breathe deeply and rejuvenate your senses. For best results, remain in bath for at least 20 to 30 minutes, as long as you are comfortable. After bathing, allow the herbal water to remain on your skin and simply pat dry with a towel. Discover the difference for yourself.  Use 2-4 times a week for immediate relief and 2-4 times a month for maintenance.

NAME: Skin Therapy, 1.7oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Ozonated Olive Oil for Any Skin-Related Need*
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Skin Therapy

Ozonated Olive Oil for Any Skin-Related Need*

O2-Zap has been reformulated into our NEW Skin Therapy. Skin Therapy smoothes and deeply moisturizes the skin with organic ozonated olive — making it perfect for all skin types. This nourishing balm also has the antioxidants to clear complexions and promote healthy-looking skin. We've even packaged Skin Therapy in an ultra-luxe MIRON Violetglass jar to preserve the ozonation of the organic olive oil.*

  • Deeply Moisturizes Dry Skin*

  • Supports Clear Complexion*

  • Promotes Quick Healing*

  • Clean, Organic Ingredients

What Is Skin Therapy?

Skin Therapy is an antioxidant-rich balm crafted with organic ozonated olive oil. Made by bubbling ozone through organic olive oil to saturate it with oxygen, Skin Therapy moisturizes in a way that nothing else can. From nourishing dry, cracked skin to soothing itches and scratches, Skin Therapy can be used for just about any skin-related need. Our rich balm is unscented and perfect for all skin types! Use morning or night as part of your skincare routine or for any cut, scrape, bug bite, or scratch. Keep refrigerated to preserve the natural ingredients.*

Preserving this luxe, plant-based formula is important to us, which is why Skin Therapy is packaged in MIRON Violetglass jars. The unique properties of this glass protect Skin Therapy's ingredients from the harmful effects of light, increase shelf life, and revitalize their potency.*

Why Your Skin Will Love Skin Therapy

Crafted with ozonated olive oil to deeply nourish and enhance healthy-looking skin.*

Ultra Moisturizing*

Dry skin, chapped lips, or a flaky scalp? Wherever your dry skin and whatever the cause, Skin Therapy delivers moisturizing oxygen that hydrates and makes your skin look great.*

Heals the Skin*

Don’t let cuts, scrapes, and scratches linger or leave a mark. Apply a little Skin Therapy or use it with your bandage to stimulate quick, healthy healing.*

Clears Complexion*

Dealing with acne or acne scars? Is your complexion not as even as you want? Olive oil provides the nutrients and antioxidants that nourish your skin down deep.*
INGREDIENTS: organic ozonated olive oil. Made by bubbling ozone through organic olive oil to saturate it with oxygen

NAME: Skin-Ease Liniment
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Dispels wind and clears heat, eliminates dampness and resolves toxins, kills chong (or "parasites") and stops itching; for wind damp heat toxin psoriasis.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Formula can be found in Si Chuan Zhong Yi ( Sichuan Chinese Medicine ), issue #1, 2008, p. 108, “Qing Yin Tang (Clear Silver Decoction) as the Main Treatment for 36 Cases of Psoriasis” by Zhu Hong-jun, Dermatology Dept., Anyang Municipal Chinese Medicine Hospital, Henan.

Functions
Dispels wind and clears heat, eliminates dampness and resolves toxins, kills chong (or “parasites”) and stops itching.

Formula Rationale
Bai Fan (Alum) and Shi Gao (Gypsum) clear heat, dry dampness, and resolve toxins[. When applied externally, Tu Jing Pi (Cortex Psuedolaricis), She Chuang Zi (Fructus Cnidii), Bai Bu (Radix Stemonae), and vinegar kill parasites, dispel dampness, and stop itching. Liu Huang (Sulfur) heals the skin and promotes the engenderment of new, healthy tissue.
INGREDIENTS:
• White Vinegar
  • Grain Alcohol
  • Stemona (Bai Bu)
  • Cnidium Fruit (She Chuang Zi)
  • Golden Larch Bark (Tu Jin Pi)
  • Sulfur (Liu Huang)
  • Gypsum (Shi Gao)
  • Prepared Alum (Ku Fan)
DOSAGE: Apply as needed to the psoriatic lesions to stop itching.
CONTRAINDICATIONS: FOR EXTERNAL APPLICATION ONLY
CHINESE_SYMPTOMOLOGY: Wind damp heat toxin psoriasis

INGREDIENTS: Herbal Extract: [Ginseng, Radix Polygoni Multiflori, Mulberry Bark, Fennel, Goji Berry, Asparagus Tuber, Angelica, Poria Cocos, Astragulus Root, Chinese Foxglove Root, Cornus, Sophora, Clematidis, Longan, Inula, Licorice Root] Green Tea Extract (Camellia Sinensis), Caprylyl Glycol, Natural Lavender Fragrance, Potassium Sorbate, Bergamot, Jade Powder

NAME: Slimming Soak, 16 oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: When combined with proper exercise and diet, this formula will aid in stimulating metabolism, encouraging fat loss, firming and tightening the skin, and reducing the appearance of cellulite.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
This centuries-proven slimming secret utilizes the powerful properties of Jade Powder combined with our proprietary blend of organic and wild-crafted herbal ingredients including, Ginseng, Cornus, and Fennel. When combined with proper exercise and diet, this formula will aid in stimulating metabolism, encouraging fat loss, firming and tightening the skin, and reducing the appearance of cellulite. Feel the difference for yourself!

Key Ingredients:

  • Ginseng, Licorice Root & Astragulus -Have adaptogenic properties that combat stress and mental and physical fatigue, as well as increase endurance and availability of energy throughout the day.
  • Stephaniae – Relieves soreness and pain in muscles and joints.
  • Angelica Root – Detoxifies and improves circulation enabling the body to quickly transport vitamins and minerals

Directions: For an unforgettable experience shake well and pour desired amount of contents into a very warm bath (at least 1/3 of bottle). Fill bath so that the water level falls just below your chest. Immerse yourself in the herb infused water to remove toxins and to calm your mind and body. Relax, breathe deeply and rejuvenate your senses. For best results, remain in bath for at least 20 to 30 minutes, as long as you are comfortable. After bathing, allow the herbal water to remain on your skin and simply pat dry with a towel. Discover the difference for yourself.  Use 2-4 times a week for immediate relief and 2-4 times a month for maintenance.
INGREDIENTS: Herbal Extract: [Ginseng, Radix Polygoni Multiflori, Mulberry Bark, Fennel, Goji Berry, Asparagus Tuber, Angelica, Poria Cocos, Astragulus Root, Chinese Foxglove Root, Cornus, Sophora, Clematidis, Longan, Inula, Licorice Root] Green Tea Extract (Camellia Sinensis), Caprylyl Glycol, Natural Lavender Fragrance, Potassium Sorbate, Bergamot, Jade Powder

NAME: Soaking Salts, Lavender
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Our soaking salts are made with a blend of pharmaceutical grade epsom salt, soothing herbs, and essential oils. Soaking your feet or taking a bath is a delightful self care practice, and adding our soaking salts will enhance relaxation, relieve muscle aches & pains, detoxify the skin, and flush out toxins.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Our soaking salts are made with a blend of pharmaceutical grade epsom salt, soothing herbs, and essential oils. Soaking your feet or taking a bath is a delightful self care practice, and adding our soaking salts will enhance relaxation, relieve muscle aches & pains, detoxify the skin, and flush out toxins.

DIRECTIONS: Add 1/2 - 2 cups of soaking salts to warm bath water. Soak for 20 minutes. For foot soaks, dissolve 1/2 cup of soaking salts into a large pot of warm water. Soak feet for 15-20 minutes.
INGREDIENTS: epsom salt, lavender flowers, lavender essential oil

NAME: Soft Seat Ointment (Hemorrhoid)
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This formula is for the external treatment of hemorrhoids. It is a formula created by Wang Ji Pin's contermpory.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
This formula comes from Zhong Guo Zhong Yi Mi Fang Da Quan ("A Great Collection of Chinese National Chinese Medical Secret Formulas").  The book states that, "In the treatment of 60 cases of  external hemorrhoids, 41 cases or 68.3% were cured, 17 cases or 28.3% improved, and only two  cases got no effect. Thus the total amelioration rate was 93.6%." 1 

Functions
Clears heat and disperses swelling, quickens the blood and stops bleeding, moves the qi and stops
pain

Formula Rationale:
Within this formula, Wu Yao ( Radix Linderae ) moves the qi; Dang Gui ( Radix Angelicae Sinensis ), Xue  Jie ( Sanguis Draconis ), and Hong Hua ( Flos Carthami ) quicken the blood and transform stasis; Da  Huang ( Radix Et Rhizoma Rhei ), Huang Lian ( Rhizoma Coptidis ), Huang Bai ( Cortex Phellodendri ), Ku Fan ( Alum ), and Bing Pian ( Borneolum ) clear heat; Di Yu ( Radix Sanguisorbae ) stops bleeding; and Shi Chang Pu ( Rhizoma Acori Tatarinowii ) stops pain when used externally. In addition, Ku Fan resolves  toxins and stops itching, and Bing Pian ( Borneolum ) stops pain and itching and disperses swelling.
INGREDIENTS:
• Beeswax         
  • Palm Vegetable Shortening
  • Fractionated Coconut Oil                    
  • Avocado Seed Oil       
  • Grape Seed Oil
  • Chinese Rhubarb (Da Huang)
  • Dong Quai (Dang Gui)
  • Sanguisorba (Di Yu)
  • Lindera (Wu Yao)
  • Safflower (Hong Hua)
  • Phellodendron (Huang Bai)
  • Coptis (Huang Lian)
  • Grass-leaf Sweet Flag (Shi Chang Pu)
  • Dragon’s Blood Palm (Xue Jie)
  • Borneol (Bing Pian) 
  • Prepared Alum (Ku Fan) 
  • Rosemary Seed Extract
DOSAGE: Apply externally several times per day as needed.
CHINESE_SYMPTOMOLOGY: heat stasis hemorrhoids
ACTIONS: moves the qi, quicken the blood, transforms stasis, clears heat, stops bleeding, stops pain when used externally, resolves toxins, stops itching, and disperses swelling.

NAME: Solstice Pain Relief Patch
SHORT_DESCRIPTION:
Solstice's Pain Relief Patch
Solstice's Pain Relief Patch is effective for temporarily relief of various minor aches and pains of muscles and joints including: minor backache, arthritis, strains, bruises and sprains.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Solstice's Pain Relief Patch
Solstice's Pain Relief Patch is effective for temporarily relief of various minor aches and pains of muscles and joints including: minor backache, arthritis, strains, bruises and sprains.

Benefits
This product contains camphor, which is effective at stimulating blood circulation in injured body parts. This can help to reduce pain. The increased circulation to the body part helps to relieve pain and to also increase the absorption of the other ingredients in the plaster.

This plaster also contains menthol, which is an analgesic that can help to relieve pain in affected body parts.
INGREDIENTS:
Pain Relief Patch contains the following:

Active ingredients:

  • Camphor 8.3%
  • Menthol 3.32%
  • Methyl salicylate 13.84%

Inactive Ingredients: African basil (Ocimum gratissimum L) herb oil, cinnamon oil, fang feng root, Formosan sweet gum (Liquidambar formosana Hance) Resin, fragrant angelica root extract, greater galangal root extract, ginger root extract, huo xue dan [Glechoma longituba (Nakai) Kuprian] aerial part, natural latex rubber, nux vomica (Strychnos nux-vomica L) seed, rosin, safflower flower, and schizonepeta (Schizonepeta tenuifolia Briq.) flowering aerial part on a cotton pad.

NAME: Sombra Cool Therapy, 1 gal.
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This gel provides controlled cooling without freezing or irritation and has exceptional glide for point therapy.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION: This gel provides controlled cooling without freezing or irritation and has exceptional glide for point therapy. The cool therapy gel is good for acute conditions or injuries that have just occurred, whereas the original warm therapy gel is good for chronic conditions and basic aches and pains. - Quick absorption formula, non-staining to clothes. - Controlled cooling without freezing or irritation. - No artificial colors, fragrances or alcohol. - Perfect for post-exercise cool down. - A cool, refreshing lemon scent. - Animal free. Made in the USA.
CATEGORY: Topical Formulations >>> Massage Topicals >>> All Massage Topicals
SUB_CATEGORIES: Topical Formulations >>> Massage Topicals >>> Massage Gels >>> Neutral Massage Gels || Topical Formulations >>> Massage Topicals >>> Massage Gels >>> All Massage Gels
INGREDIENTS: Active Ingredients: Menthol, USP 6.0%. Inactive Ingredients: aloe vera extract, carbomer, decyl polyglucose, deinoized water, grapefruit seed extract, green tea extract, lemon peel extract, queen of the prairie extract, rose water, sodium hydroxymethylglycinate, vegetable glycerin, witch hazel, yucca extract.
DOSAGE: Apply to affected area not more than 3 to 4 times daily. Rub in thorougly until gel is absorbed.
CONTRAINDICATIONS: For external use only. Do not use on wounds or damaged skin. Avoid bandaging tightly. Avoid contact with eyes.
ACTIONS: Relieves minor aches and pains of muscles and joints associated with arthritis, simple backaches, strains, bruises and sprains.

NAME: Spirit Quieting Massage Oil
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This massage oil is made from several Chinese herbs which are all famous for calming the heart, coursing the liver, quieting the spirit, and resolving depression.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
This massage oil is made from several Chinese herbs which are all famous for calming the heart, coursing the liver, quieting the spirit, and resolving depression. Oil-based massage is especially effective for treating chaotic qi states associated with mental- emotional stress and anxiety.

Formula Rationale
He Huan Hua (Flos Albiziae) courses the liver , quickens the blood and quiets the spirit. Bai He (Bulbus Lilii) nourishes and enriches the heart, clears heat from the heart and quiets the spirit. Shi Chang Pu (Rhizoma Acori Tatarinowii) opens the orifices, dispels phlegm, and quiets the spirit. Chen Xiang (Lignum Aquilariae) courses the liver and moves the qi, downbears counterflow . Yuan Zhi (Radix Polygalae) quiets the heart and calms the spirit, dispels phlegm and opens the orifices. Sweet Orange oil is added as a fragrance and also moves and harmonizes the qi.

Method of Use
This massage oil can be used in any of three ways: 1) As a full body massage oil, 2) as a self-massage oil during times of stress, and 3) as a bath oil. For self-massage, rub a small amount of this oil into Tai Yang (M-HN-9), Yin Tang (M-HN-3), Feng Chi (GB 20), Da Zhui (GV 14), Dan Zhong (CV 17), and the spinous processes of T4 and T5. As a bath oil, stir 3-5 capfuls in a tub of hot water.
CATEGORY: Topical Formulations >>> Massage Topicals >>> All Massage Topicals
INGREDIENTS: Apricot Kernel Oil, Fractionated Coconut Oil, Avocado Oil, Olive Oil, Grape Seed Oil, He Huan Hua, Bai He, Shi Chang Pu, Yuan Zhi, Gan Song, and essential oils of Sweet Orange, Ho Wood, Bergamot, and Jatamansi.
DOSAGE: This massage oil can be used in andy of three ways: 1) As a full body massage oil, 2) as a self-massage oil during times of stress, and 3) as a bath oil. For self-massage, rub a small amount of this oil into Tai Yang (M-HN-9), Yin Tang (M-HN-3), Feng Chi
CHINESE_SYMPTOMOLOGY: Restlessness, anxiety, insomnia, profuse dreams, vexation and agitation
ACTIONS: Courses the liver and rectifies the qi, resolves depression and quiets the spirit

NAME: Stress-Relieving Soak, 128 oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This formula powerfully increases chi (energy), detoxifies, and calms the mind.  By increasing chi your condition will become harmonized, your mind will attain clarity, and muscles and joints will become relaxed. Feel the difference for yourself!*
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
This centuries-proven stress-relieving formula consists of the finest organic and wild-crafted herbal ingredients for the most effective and immediate results. This formula powerfully increases chi (energy), detoxifies, and calms the mind.  By increasing chi your condition will become harmonized, your mind will attain clarity, and muscles and joints will become relaxed. Feel the difference for yourself!*

Directions: For an unforgettable experience shake well and pour desired amount of contents into a very warm bath. Fill bath so that the water level falls just below your chest. Immerse yourself in the herb infused water to remove toxins and to calm your mind and body. Relax, breathe deeply and rejuvenate your senses. For best results, remain in bath for at least 20 to 30 minutes, as long as you are comfortable. After bathing, allow the herbal water to remain on your skin and simply pat dry with a towel. Discover the difference for yourself.  Use 2-4 times a week for immediate relief and 2-4 times a month for maintenance.

NAME: Super-Dry Soother
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: The name says it all - click name to read more!
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
How Our SUPER-DRY Soother Differs from our Baby and Adult Skin Soother.

Quite simply, it is a different formula with a slightly different focus. Both products were created to soothe dry skin conditions. The SUPER-DRY Soother is meant to be a stronger formula for more severe dryness. We’ve combined different herbs, used organic sunflower oil and the scents of bergamot and lavender to make a lovely smelling and smooth feeling product that anyone can use. We hope you’ll share it with the people you love for things as simple as general moisturizing and as troubling as severe winter dryness on the hands or feet–and everything in between.

Sunflower Oil has been shown in research to create a protective barrier for damaged or vulnerable skin. Here is a link to an article on that research: Sunflower Oil Research Article. The herbs in this formula are herbs traditionally used to promote circulation and accelerate healing. Altogether, our Super-Dry Soother is meant to soothe and beautify any type of dry skin, even when it is Super-Dry.
SUB_CATEGORIES: Holiday Gift Ideas >>> Winter Moisturizers || Beauty, Hair & Skin Care
INGREDIENTS: Organic Sunflower Oil Beeswax Frankincense Red Peony Root Rhubarb Root Dandelion Essential Oils of Lavender and Bergamot

Quite simply, it is a different formula with a slightly different focus. Both products were created to soothe dry skin conditions. The SUPER-DRY Soother is meant to be a stronger formula for more severe dryness. We hope you’ll share it with the people you love for things as simple as general moisturizing and as troubling as severe winter dryness on the hands or feet–and everything in between.

Sunflower Oil has been shown in research to create a protective barrier for damaged or vulnerable skin. Here is a link to an article on that research: Sunflower Oil Research Article. NAME: Tea Tree Oil, 1 oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: for healing skin cuts, burns, and infections
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION: Tea tree has a long history of traditional use. Australian aboriginals used tea tree leaves for healing skin cuts, burns, and infections by crushing the leaves and applying them to the affected area. Tea tree oil contains constituents called terpenoids, which have been found to have antiseptic and antifungal activity. The compound terpinen-4-ol is the most abundant and is thought to be responsible for most of tea tree oil's antimicrobial activity.*
INGREDIENTS: Tea Tree Oil is a steam distilled 100% pure essential oil
DOSAGE: aromatherapy or dilute in vegetable oil for topical use
PROPERTIES: Anti-bacterial; Anti-microbial; Anti-fungal; Anti-candida; Vermifuge (kills parasites)
CONTRAINDICATIONS: all internal use, eyes, mucous membranes

DOSAGE: Apply liberally several times daily to the affected area.

NAME: The Ultimate Rebalancing Soak, 128 oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This proprietary formula quickly rebalances chi (energy), increases circulation and oxygenation, and detoxifies.*
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Harmonize and rebalance your mind and body with this powerful formula of organic and wild-crafted herbal ingredients.  For thousands of years the most revered doctors and herbologists of East Asia have used this formula to quickly rebalance and strengthen the body, enabling it to function at its most optimal level. This proprietary formula quickly rebalances chi (energy), increases circulation and oxygenation, and detoxifies.  Feel the difference for yourself!*

Directions: For an unforgettable experience shake well and pour desired amount of contents into a very warm bath. Fill bath so that the water level falls just below your chest. Immerse yourself in the herb infused water to remove toxins and to calm your mind and body. Relax, breathe deeply and rejuvenate your senses. For best results, remain in bath for at least 20 to 30 minutes, as long as you are comfortable. After bathing, allow the herbal water to remain on your skin and simply pat dry with a towel. Discover the difference for yourself.  Use 2-4 times a week for immediate relief and 2-4 times a month for maintenance.*
INGREDIENTS: Herbal Extracts: (Red Ginseng, Radix Astragali, Radix Rehmanniae Glutinosae Conquitae, Fructus Schisandrae, Radix Angelica Sinensis (Dang Gui), Radix Ligustici Chuanxiong, Ginger, Cortex Cinnamoni, Goji Berry, Radix Ophiopogonis, Arillus Longan, Jujube, Radix Glycyrrhizae) Green Tea Extract (Camellia Sinensis), Caprylyl Glycol, Natural Lavender Fragrance, Potassium Sorbate, Bergamot, Jade Powder

SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Wind, damp, qi, and blood stasis. Most commonly used for pain, menstrual disorders, and supporting healthy circulation. This is a great way to get people with sensitive stomaches using herbs as they are topical soaking into the skin via terpenes and alkaloids.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
A great combination of Tibetan herbs stimulate deep regenerative processes critical for the brain and body. Literally the best quality on Earth. Direct sourcing, wildcrafted, and tingly. Enriched with tibetan salts to provide not only the volatile oils, but the mineral effects of a high mountain hot spring.

Upgrade your clinic flow and effective rate.

Wind, damp, qi, and blood stasis. Most commonly used for pain, menstrual disorders, and supporting healthy circulation. This is a great way to get people with sensitive stomaches using herbs as they are topical soaking into the skin via terpenes and alkaloids.

Please store in a cool and dry place. Keep away from direct sunlight. Keep sealed after opening. Keep out of the reach of children

Shelf life:

3 years.

External use only

Precautions:

  1. Avoid foot soaks if you have open wounds, bleeding disorder, infection, burns, or if you are hungry or within 30 minutes of a meal.

  2. Avoid doing foot soaks under draft.

  3. Avoid using this foot soak herbal formula if you are pregnant, have metastatic cancer or other situations that you should not move blood.

  4. Be cautious on children. Please consult with a qualified practitioner for children.

  5. Be cautious when you have a cold or allergies.

  6. Avoid foot soaks right after surgery. Wait for at least 7 days post-surgery.

  7. Avoid foot soaks for any other conditions that are not suitable to move blood or increase circulation.

Precautions:

Warnings:For external use only.

When using this product:
- Use only as directed
- Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes
- Do not apply to wounds, damaged skin or irritated skin
- Do not bandage or cover with wrap or use heating pad.
- Do not use 1 hour prior t bathing or within 30 minutes after bathing.
- Avoid inhalation.
- Do not use in confined space.

Flammable:
- Do not use near heat or flame or while smoking.
- Avoid long term storage above 104°F (40°C).
- Do not puncture or incinerate. contents under pressure.
- Do not store at temperatures above 120°F (49°C)

Stop use and ask a doctor if:
- Condition worsens
- Severe skin irritation occurs
- Pain persists for more than 7 days
- Pain clears up and then recurs a few days later.

If pregnant or breastfeeding, or if you have sensitive skin, ask a healthcare professional before use.

Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact Poison Control Center immediately.

Active Ingredients: Methyl Salicylate25% (Topical Analgesic), Menthol 16% (Topical Analgesic), Camphor 7% (Topical Analgesic)
