NAME: Tinted Mineral Sunscreen Bronze SPF 31, 1oz tube
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Discover the power of our 100% Zinc Oxide Broad Spectrum SPF 31 Protection in the form of a tinted mineral sunscreen.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Discover the power of our 100% Zinc Oxide Broad Spectrum SPF 31 Protection in the form of a tinted mineral sunscreen. Not only is it effective in shielding your skin from harmful UV rays, but it also carries the goodness of being environmentally friendly. Our biodegradable, non-toxic formula is thoughtfully crafted without any harmful chemicals, making it a perfect choice for those with an active outdoor lifestyle.

Feel the confidence of using our sunscreen near waterways, as it's reef and river safe, ensuring you contribute to preserving our planet's precious ecosystems. Combining the benefits of super clean skincare with SPF protection, our tinted mineral sunscreen instantly color corrects, leaving your skin looking even and radiant.

Suitable for all skin types, this sunscreen delivers a natural and flawless appearance while providing optimal sun protection. Embrace a sunscreen that not only cares for your skin but also cares for the environment, allowing you to indulge in the great outdoors with peace of mind.

How to Use

Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. If swimming or sweating, towel dry and reapply immediately. Reapply at least every 2 hours.

Prepare Your Skin: Start with clean and moisturized skin. Ensure your skincare routine is complete before applying the pure mineral foundation.

Dispense a Few Small Dabs: Begin by dispensing a few small dabs of the pure mineral foundation on your forehead, cheeks, and chin. You can adjust the amount based on your desired coverage.

Blend from Center Outwards: Using your fingertips or a makeup sponge, blend the foundation as much as possible from the center of your face outwards. Focus on achieving an even and seamless application.

Extend to Neck: Blend the foundation onto your neck to ensure a natural and seamless transition from your face to your neck area. This step helps create a uniform and flawless finish.

Even Application Around Eyes, Nose, and Mouth: Apply the foundation evenly around the eyes, nose, and mouth. Be gentle and precise, ensuring a smooth and flawless finish in these delicate areas.

Build Coverage as Needed: If you desire more coverage in specific areas, gently layer the foundation using the same technique. Pure mineral foundations are buildable, allowing you to customize your coverage.

Blend Along Jawline: To avoid harsh lines and achieve a natural look, blend the foundation along your jawline, ensuring a seamless blend between your face and neck.

Set with Powder (Optional): If you prefer a matte finish or need extra staying power, consider setting the foundation with a light dusting of translucent powder.

Finish with Additional Makeup (Optional): Complete your makeup look by adding other products such as blush, bronzer, and highlighter as desired.

Cleanse and Remove at the End of the Day: At the end of the day, remember to cleanse your face thoroughly to remove the pure mineral foundation. Use a gentle cleanser suitable for your skin type.

Enjoy the ease and versatility of our pure mineral foundation. Whether you choose to apply it with your fingertips or a sponge, you can achieve a flawless finish that enhances your natural beauty while caring for your skin's health. Experiment with coverage and techniques to find the perfect application that works for you.

Benefits

Broad Spectrum SPF 31 Protection: Our tinted mineral sunscreen provides reliable sun protection, guarding your skin against harmful UVA and UVB rays, helping prevent sunburn and skin damage.

Environmental Consciousness: By choosing our sunscreen, you're making an eco-friendly choice. The biodegradable and reef-safe formula ensures that you can enjoy the outdoors without compromising our planet's delicate ecosystems.

Non-Toxic and Harmful Chemical-Free: Our sunscreen's non-toxic formula is free from harmful chemicals, making it a safe and gentle option for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

Discover the power of our 100% Zinc Oxide Broad Spectrum SPF 31 Protection in the form of a tinted mineral sunscreen. Not only is it effective in shielding your skin from harmful UV rays, but it also carries the goodness of being environmentally friendly. Our biodegradable, non-toxic formula is thoughtfully crafted without any harmful chemicals, making it a perfect choice for those with an active outdoor lifestyle.

Feel the confidence of using our sunscreen near waterways, as it's reef and river safe, ensuring you contribute to preserving our planet's precious ecosystems. Combining the benefits of super clean skincare with SPF protection, our tinted mineral sunscreen instantly color corrects, leaving your skin looking even and radiant.

Suitable for all skin types, this sunscreen delivers a natural and flawless appearance while providing optimal sun protection. Embrace a sunscreen that not only cares for your skin but also cares for the environment, allowing you to indulge in the great outdoors with peace of mind.

How to Use

Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. If swimming or sweating, towel dry and reapply immediately. Reapply at least every 2 hours.

Prepare Your Skin: Start with clean and moisturized skin. Ensure your skincare routine is complete before applying the pure mineral foundation.

Dispense a Few Small Dabs: Begin by dispensing a few small dabs of the pure mineral foundation on your forehead, cheeks, and chin. You can adjust the amount based on your desired coverage.

Blend from Center Outwards: Using your fingertips or a makeup sponge, blend the foundation as much as possible from the center of your face outwards. Focus on achieving an even and seamless application.

Extend to Neck: Blend the foundation onto your neck to ensure a natural and seamless transition from your face to your neck area. This step helps create a uniform and flawless finish.

Even Application Around Eyes, Nose, and Mouth: Apply the foundation evenly around the eyes, nose, and mouth. Be gentle and precise, ensuring a smooth and flawless finish in these delicate areas.

Build Coverage as Needed: If you desire more coverage in specific areas, gently layer the foundation using the same technique. Pure mineral foundations are buildable, allowing you to customize your coverage.

Blend Along Jawline: To avoid harsh lines and achieve a natural look, blend the foundation along your jawline, ensuring a seamless blend between your face and neck.

Set with Powder (Optional): If you prefer a matte finish or need extra staying power, consider setting the foundation with a light dusting of translucent powder.

Finish with Additional Makeup (Optional): Complete your makeup look by adding other products such as blush, bronzer, and highlighter as desired.

Cleanse and Remove at the End of the Day: At the end of the day, remember to cleanse your face thoroughly to remove the pure mineral foundation. Use a gentle cleanser suitable for your skin type.

Enjoy the ease and versatility of our pure mineral foundation. Whether you choose to apply it with your fingertips or a sponge, you can achieve a flawless finish that enhances your natural beauty while caring for your skin's health. Ku Shen (Radix Sophorae)
Da Huang (Radix Et Rhizoma Rhei)
Di Fu Zi (Fructus Kochiae)
Huang Bai (Cortex Phellodendri)
Tu Fu Ling (Rhizoma Smalcis)
Chi Shao (Radix Rubra Paeoniae)
Tu Bie Chong (Eupolyphaga/Steleophaga)
White vinegar

ACTIONS: Within this formula, Ku Shen, Da Huang, Di Fu Zi, Huang Bai, and Tu Fu Ling all clear heat and eliminate dampness, all are known to be anti fungal, and all are important Chinese medicinals for external application in the treatment of especially mycotic dermatoses.  Chi Shao and Tu Bie Chong quicken the blood and free the flow of the network vessels.  Vinegar is also a well-known antifungal medicinal which also quickens the blood.  In particular, vinegar is known to treat toenail fungus.

NAME: Total Body Detox Soak, 128 oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This revolutionary soak is a combination of modern science and ancient herbal wisdom. This 20-minute treatment consists of powerful East Asian herbs, including Burdock Root, Ledebouriella and Moutan.  These herbs have been known throughout the centuries to detoxify and relax muscles enabling the proper flow of chi (energy) throughout the body.  Feel the difference for yourself!
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Every day we take into our systems a wide variety of toxins and chemical from our lifestyles, including stress, habits, the foods we eat, and even the air we breathe.  it is of utmost importance to increase the chi (life force energy) within in order to strengthen the function of our organ systems and purify our minds and spirits so that the natural detoxification process of our bodies works at its optimal level.

This revolutionary soak is a combination of modern science and ancient herbal wisdom. This 20-minute treatment consists of powerful East Asian herbs, including Burdock Root, Ledebouriella and Moutan.  These herbs have been known throughout the centuries to detoxify and relax muscles enabling the proper flow of chi (energy) throughout the body.  Feel the difference for yourself!

Key Ingredients:

  • Burdock Root is known to: Moisten the intestines and promotes bowel movements, Resolve toxicity, Have an antibiotic effect
  • Ledebouriella (Saposhnikoviae Root) is known to: Harmonize the intestines, Reduce tenesmus and alleviate spasms, Alleviate gas and bloating
  • Cortex Moutan is known to: Increase circulation, Have an anti-microbial effect, Clear the liver, Reduce swelling
  • Mulberry is known to: Have a detoxifying effect, Reduce edema, Have an effect on harmonizing blood pressure

Directions: For an unforgettable experience shake well and pour desired amount of contents into a very warm bath. Fill bath so that the water level falls just below your chest. Immerse yourself in the herb infused water to remove toxins and to calm your mind and body. Relax, breathe deeply and rejuvenate your senses. For best results, remain in bath for at least 20 to 30 minutes, as long as you are comfortable. After bathing, allow the herbal water to remain on your skin and simply pat dry with a towel. Discover the difference for yourself.  Use 2-4 times a week for immediate relief and 2-4 times a month for maintenance.

NAME: Total Body Detox Soak, 16 oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This revolutionary soak is a combination of modern science and ancient herbal wisdom. This 20-minute treatment consists of powerful East Asian herbs, including Burdock Root, Ledebouriella and Moutan.  These herbs have been known throughout the centuries to detoxify and relax muscles enabling the proper flow of chi (energy) throughout the body.  Feel the difference for yourself!
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Every day we take into our systems a wide variety of toxins and chemical from our lifestyles, including stress, habits, the foods we eat, and even the air we breathe.  it is of utmost importance to increase the chi (life force energy) within in order to strengthen the function of our organ systems and purify our minds and spirits so that the natural detoxification process of our bodies works at its optimal level.

This revolutionary soak is a combination of modern science and ancient herbal wisdom. This 20-minute treatment consists of powerful East Asian herbs, including Burdock Root, Ledebouriella and Moutan.  These herbs have been known throughout the centuries to detoxify and relax muscles enabling the proper flow of chi (energy) throughout the body.  Feel the difference for yourself!

Key Ingredients:

  • Burdock Root is known to: Moisten the intestines and promotes bowel movements, Resolve toxicity, Have an antibiotic effect
  • Ledebouriella (Saposhnikoviae Root) is known to: Harmonize the intestines, Reduce tenesmus and alleviate spasms, Alleviate gas and bloating
  • Cortex Moutan is known to: Increase circulation, Have an anti-microbial effect, Clear the liver, Reduce swelling
  • Mulberry is known to: Have a detoxifying effect, Reduce edema, Have an effect on harmonizing blood pressure

Directions: For an unforgettable experience shake well and pour desired amount of contents into a very warm bath (at least 1/4 of bottle). Fill bath so that the water level falls just below your chest. Immerse yourself in the herb infused water to remove toxins and to calm your mind and body. Relax, breathe deeply and rejuvenate your senses. For best results, remain in bath for at least 20 to 30 minutes, as long as you are comfortable. After bathing, allow the herbal water to remain on your skin and simply pat dry with a towel. Discover the difference for yourself.  Use 2-4 times a week for immediate relief and 2-4 times a month for maintenance.
INGREDIENTS: Herbal Extract:  (Burdock Root, Cortex Moutan, Ledebouriella, Mulberry Bark     Stephania, Asparagus Tuber, Angelica, Poria Cocos, Astragulus, Chinese Foxglove Root, Fructus Corni Officinalis, Sophora, Ginseng, Clematidis, Longan, Inula, Licorice Root) Green Tea Extract (Camellia Sinensis), Caprylyl Glycol, Natural Lavender Fragrance, Potassium Sorbate, Bergamot, Jade Powder

NAME: Unscented Hot Skin Soother
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Feeling hot? We've got the answer and it is brand new
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Just in time for summer we are launching our brand new Emily Unscented Hot Skin Soother. Think sweat rash, heat rashes, skin issues in hot damp places like skin folds, armpits, groin, and elbow and knee creases. If your skin gets red, hot and angry we hope to soothe it.

Like the rest of our products, this balm is simple and made of just a few powerful, natural ingredients. As the label at the top of the jar says, “We think of it as alchemy with herbs.”

No scent is added or needed because the product is simple and clean and you can smell a very light hint of the pounds and pounds of herbs we use to make it.

Put all that together and you have a balm designed to soothe and beautify skin that is hot, red or angry. We can't and won't make any medical claims, but we hope you'll try it out on things like sunburn, sore hot muscles (for massage), sweat rashes, heat rashes and the like.

Please let us know what you think and what you end up using it for. We want to share your testimonials and feedback. We hope you find it lovely, soothing and effective.
INGREDIENTS: What's in it? Six simple ingredients: • Organic Sunflower Oil: chock full of Vitamin E, it soothes dry skin • Beeswax: a natural barrier that is both protective and antiseptic • Frankincense and Red Peony: This pair of herbs has been traditionally used to promote circulation and is said to "generate flesh" in Chinese herbology. The pair is also slightly analgesic so they may diminish discomfort of irritated skin. Peony also demonstrates an inhibitory action against some bacteria.  • Dictamnus Root Bark and Phellodendron Bark: These two herbs are categorized as bitter and cold and are used traditionally for extreme heat signs, 'damp-heat'. They are often used for sores, rashes, eczema and demonstrate antifungal and antimicrobial effects.

Here's how you can trust that our products will give you desired results without sacrificing quality:

  • food-grade preservatives only:  We use food-grade preservatives only, never scary chemical preservatives, and we never use chemical emulsifiers, fragrances or alcohol.
  • High Quality Ingredients:  We source cold-pressed, raw, organic oils, as well as high-quality, non-gmo, organic vitamins and extracts.
  • Organic or Wildcrafted Herbs:  We infuse our organic or wildcrafted herbs in Sunflower, Grapeseed, or Olive oil, using the slow method - no heat - to ensure that all of the nutrients are alive and potent.

At Peak Scents, we never outsource production because it allows us to guarantee that our products have the integrity our customers expect. We are committed to sourcing our ingredients through partners who share an aligned dedication to responsible practices. We are passionate about creating sustainable change in the world through intelligent, ethical business customs. Our commitment to never outsource production ensures that when you choose us as, you can trust the products you receive will adhere to those same ideals.

NAME: Yang Qi Adrenal Hug Balm Sample, 5ml
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Yang Qi Adrenal Hug is a balm for tonifying Yang Qi and supporting energy recovery from adrenal fatigue. The formula consists of premium herbal oils and C02 extracts that warm the body and qi, build the Yang Qi and support healthy adrenal function.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Yang Qi Adrenal Hug is a balm for tonifying Yang Qi and supporting energy recovery from adrenal fatigue. The formula consists of premium herbal oils and C02 extracts that warm the body and qi, build the Yang Qi and support healthy adrenal function. When used for yang qi deficiency, fatigue and cold it is nicely warming especially when applied over the lower abdomen, front or back. It is excellent for:

  • Spleen and Kidney yang qi deficiency with or without damp,
  • Cold and tired energy,
  • Chronic Fatigue, adrenal fatigue, irregular cortisol levels,
  • Asthma
  • Fertility ovulation support stimulating FSH and LH levels,
  • Gynecology for yang xu or patterns with cold and some damp,
  • Sleep difficulties related to adrenals function and cortisol imbalances
  • Frequent urination from cold lower jiao (cold abdominal core),
  • Cold sensation in the torso,
  • Weak lower back or legs,
  • Tired spirit,
  • Emotional exhaustion.

Chinese herbal oils, essential oils and C02 extracts have been combined with skin nourishing butters. All ingredients are organic where possible. 

The skin nourishing butters we use feel amazing on your skin. Our unique balm base is non-greasy, antibacterial, anti-inflammatory, anti-aging, high in Vit A, E, and many other skin food nutrients.

  • Cacao Butter
  • Ucuuba Butter
  • Mango Butter
  • Active oils include Rou Gui C02 (cinnamon bark), Sheng Jiang C02 (ginger), Ai ye (moxa / mugwort), Ru Xiang (frankincense), and more.

DIRECTIONS: Apply approximately 1/4 teaspoon to the lower back, abdomen, or areas of the body where your skin is colder to touch. You can also apply this to the abodomen for fertility or gynaecology, acupoints along the kidney channel, and those that tonify yang qi, or clear cold. This is enough for an area the size of your two hands. You can also apply a small finger dab to acupoints.

After approximately 15 minutes you will notice more internal warmth in the torso and areas applied. It can spread to assist cold extremities even after being applied to the lower torso. This product is quite effective and potent yet the warming effect is subtle, it is not ‘hot’ on the skin. Smelling the ointment can help with emotional exhaustion.

For chronic yang qi deficiency or chronic fatigue: apply to the lower abdomen and lower back each morning.

For asthma apply to the back shu points and lower back.

For emotional exhaustion: apply it to the lower inner ankle area (kidney channel points), the sternum (KD 21- 27) and the abdomen. If shock or fear has been a major factor, also apply it over your kidneys and lower back. If the spirit or shen is tired, or experiencing compassion fatigue, apply it between the shoulder blades, over the back shu spirit points,  (BL42 – BL49).

EXTERNAL USE ONLY.

AVOID:  Applying it close to the eyes, mouth, or other orifices. It may sting and cause irritation.

These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. For further care we recommend Chinese medicine practitioners.

BONUS VIOLET GLASS: This balm is packaged in Violet Science Glass, which is the best packaging we can use for products with medicinal oils or active ingredients. Plastics can leach out toxic chemicals when oils are stored in them, and violet glass is able to preserve ingredients for a long time, better than any other color glass. See our FAQ to learn more about Violet Glass and why it is so amazing.

GIFT: We recommend you keep your violet glass container when your balm runs out. Wash it and reuse it in your kitchen. This dark ultra violet glass appears black but is violet in the sunlight. It will preserve herbs, spices, culinary leftovers, medicinal potions and more. The retail value of the 1 oz /30ml violet glass jar alone is currently around $15. This is our gift for you to keep. The medicine just keeps on going!
INGREDIENTS:
**≠Cacao butter, **Ucuuba Butter, **Mango Butter, **Cedarwood oil, *Rou Gui C02 extract (cinnamomi cortex), **Sheng Jiang C02 extract (ginger), **Ru Xiang oil (frankincense carteri), *Ai Ye oil (artemisiae argyi folium), **Vetiver oil.

**Certified Organic ingredient.
* Ingredient tested for pesticide residues. 
≠ Fair Trade ingredient.

This product relieves pain by removing corns and calluses.

China

NAME: Yin Care
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Please see Kuan Yin Apothecary for Alternate Items
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Please see Kuan Yin Apothecary for Alternate Items

A combination of 14 highly concentrated herbs treasured for their anti-pathogenic properties, Yin-care is easy to use and will considerably expany your treatment options for a wide range of conditions. In the arcane wisdom of TCM, Yin-care is designed for use in the treatment of damp, damp-heat, toxic heat, and wind-type pathogenic factors. In biomedical terms, Yin-care is formulated primarily for external use in treatment of skin conditions and gynecological infections due to viral, bacterial, fungal or yeast-type microbial pathogens. For gynecological use, an applicator that holds 100ml and has a built in measuring system.

Topical: Mix (5-100%) herbal concentrate with various amounts of water into a solution, apply directly to skin as a wash, compress or sitz bath, 2-3x day.

Vaginally: utilize washing receptacle (douche) and mix 5-20% concentrate with water, rinse 2-3x day, 5-6 days a course of treatment.  For more serious vaginal conditions, soak tampon with 50% concentration mixture and insert for 3-5 hours 1-2x days, 6 days as course of treatment.
INGREDIENTS: Sm. Cnidii - She Chuang Zi; Hb. Menthae - Bo He; Cx. Phellodendri - Huang Bai; Fr. Gardeniae - Zhi Zi; Rx. Scutellariae - Huang Qin; Rx. Sophorae - Ku Shen; Fr. Kochia - Di Fu Zi; Fl. Lonicerae - Jin Yin Hua; Hb. Artemesiae C. - Yin Chen Hao; Rx. Angelicae D. - Du Huo; Rhiz. Artactylodis L. - Cang Zhu; Rhiz. Acori - Shi Chang Pu; Fo. A. Argyi - Ai Ye; Cx. Pseudolarix - Tu Jing Pi;
DOSAGE: Topically:  Mix (5-100%) herbal concentrate with various amounts of water into a solution, apply directly to skin as a wash, compress or sitz bath 2-3x day.  Vaginally:  Utilize washing receptacle (douche) and mix 5-20% concentrate with water, rinse 2-3x
CONTRAINDICATIONS: Not for oral/ingestible application.   In rare instances, skin sensitive patients may react to this product in concentrations above 5%.
CHINESE_SYMPTOMOLOGY: skin itching;swelling;skin lesion;skin inflammation;burns
WESTERN_SYMPTOMOLOGY: Gynecological: vaginitis, leucorrhea, vulvovaginitis, cervicitis, cervical dysplasia, gonorrhea, STDâ€™s as well as general inflammations, infections and itching.Dermatological: General fungal, bacterial and viral infections including (but not limited to) rashes, dermatitis, acne, foot fungus, shingles, cold sore and sty.  Toxic heat afflictions such as poison oak/ivy and insect bite.  Excess type skin eruptions such as some varieties of eczema and psoriasis.
ACTIONS: Dry and transform dampness, clear heat and toxin, purge fire, cool blood, disperse wind and stop itching, reduce swelling, detoxify skin lesions and promote circulation.

NAME: Yoni Herbal Steam, 3.3oz
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Used to harmonize the yoni and help keep it in balance. You can use our yoni steam for amenorrhea, dysmenorrhea, dryness, blood stagnation, or stasis, cold in the uterus, dampness, abnormal leukorrhea, regulation of periods & post miscarriage.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
This product is used to harmonize the yoni and help keep it in balance. You can use our yoni steam for amenorrhea, dysmenorrhea, dryness, blood stagnation, or stasis, cold in the uterus, dampness, abnormal leukorrhea, regulation of periods & post miscarriage.

Each bag has enough herbs for two steams. Recommended use for pre-bleeding to support easy flow and post-bleeding to help the yoni return to balance. For post-menopausal women use steam as needed to help nourish and moisten the yoni.

WHEN SHOULD I USE THE STEAM?
The 3.3 oz bag is meant to be used for two steams. We designed this so the steam is used pre & post menstruation. We recommend 3-5 days before and after bleeding.  

WHEN SHOULD I NOT USE THE STEAM?
Do not use the steam if you are menstruating, pregnant, or could be pregnant. We do not advise using it if you are spontaneously bleeding heavily, have open sores or if you have an IUD.

HOW TO USE THE STEAM?
Pour half the bag of herbs into a boil-safe pot & cover with purified water, let soak for 10 minutes.
Bring to a soft boil & lower to a simmer for 15 minutes. Remove the lid and pour it into your favorite yoni steam pot, seat, or steamer.
Allow to cool for 7-10 minutes making sure the steam doesn't burn your delicate yoni! Then wrap a towel around you or wear a robe to seal in the steam.
Relax & Enjoy for 20-30 minutes!

WHAT IS IT USED FOR?
amenorrhea, dysmenorrhea, dryness, blood stagnation, or stasis, cold in the uterus, dampness, abnormal leukorrhea, regulation of periods, detoxification of the womb & post miscarriage.

TRADITIONAL HERBAL MEDICINE
Kuan Yin Yoni Herbal Steam is made with a proprietary blend of traditional Chinese herbal medicine. All of our herbs are sourced from manufacturers with certifications in Good Manufacturing Practices.
SUB_CATEGORIES: Topical Formulations >>> Yoni Steam / Wash || Massage & Bodywork
INGREDIENTS: Yi Mu Cao (Leonuri Herba), She Chuang Zi (Cnidii Fructus), Tou Gu Cao (Caulis Impatientis), Ze Lan (Lycopi Herba), Fu Pen Zi (Rubi Fructus), Ai Ye (Artemisiae Argyi Folium), Mei Gui Hua (Rosae Rugosae Flos), Chuan/Hua Jiao (Zanthoxyli Pericarpium), Hong Hua (Carthami Flos), Pei Lan (Eupatorii Herba)
DOSAGE: Pour half the bag of herbs into a boil-safe pot & cover with purified water, let soak for 10 minutes. Bring to a soft boil then lower to a simmer for 15 minutes. Remove the lid and pour it into your favorite yoni steam pot, seat, or steamer. Allow to cool for 7-10 minutes, then wrap a towel around you or wear a robe to seal in the steam. Relax & Enjoy for 20-30 minutes!

NAME: Yoni Steam, Cleansing
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This cleansing yoni steam is beneficial if you are prone to conditions marked by heat and dampness such as urinary tract infections or yeast infections.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
This cleansing yoni steam is beneficial if you are prone to conditions marked by heat and dampness such as urinary tract infections or yeast infections. 

Yoni steams bring moist heat to the womb & perineum, carrying with it the medicinal properties of the herbs. The vaginal tissue is highly absorbent, and when the herbal steam comes into contact with the body, the medicinal properties of the herbs are absorbed into the tissue and enter the bloodstream. This has a direct healing effect on the reproductive system. Yoni steams can be used to support vaginal health, cleanse the uterus, and maintain fertility. Since yoni steams increase blood flow to the vaginal area, it can have a positive effect on libido and the vaginal fluids. In general, yoni steams are beneficial for painful menstruation, irregular menstrual cycles, menstrual spotting, endometriosis, ovarian cysts, uterine fibroids, reproductive scar tissue, and previous vaginal tear or episiotomy.

DIRECTIONS: Bring 2 quarts of water to a boil. Add 1 cup of yoni steaming herbs to boiling water. Gently simmer for 10 minutes, keep covered. While your herbs simmer, set up a relaxing area for steaming. After the herbs have simmered for 10 minutes, turn off the heat and allow the water & herbs to cool for 5 minutes. Carefully pour the hot water and herbs into a heat safe basin. Position the basin below where you will sit. Disrobe from the waist down, but leave on a warm pair of socks. Sit comfortably above the basin with your yoni exposed to the steam. The steam should feel warm but not too hot. Wrap yourself in a towel from the waist down to keep yourself warm and the steam contained. Relax and enjoy the healing benefits for 20-30 minutes. After your yoni steam, dress yourself in warm dry clothing. It is recommended to steam before bed. Suggested to steam 1-2 times a month before or after your menstrual cycle

DETAILS: The resealable bag contains approximately enough herbs for 3 yoni steams.
SUB_CATEGORIES: Topical Formulations >>> Yoni Steam / Wash || Massage & Bodywork
INGREDIENTS: yin chen hao (virgule wormwood), jin qian cao (lysimachia), rosemary
CONTRAINDICATIONS: Do not use a yoni steam during pregnancy or if you think you may be pregnant. It is not recommended to use a yoni steam if you have an IUD or during menstruation. Avoid use if you have open wounds. Do not add essential oils in your steam bath because they may burn the delicate tissues of the genitals.

NAME: Yoni Steam, Relaxing
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: To aid in the relaxation of the uterine smooth muscle. Beneficial to use before your moon cycle to prevent menstrual cramps. Can also be used to maintain and support vaginal health.

After your yoni steam, dress yourself in warm dry clothing. It is recommended to steam before bed. Suggested to steam 1-2 times a month before or after your menstrual cycle

DETAILS: The resealable bag contains approximately enough herbs for 3 yoni steams.
SUB_CATEGORIES: Topical Formulations >>> Yoni Steam / Wash || Massage & Bodywork
INGREDIENTS: lavender, rose, basil
CONTRAINDICATIONS: Do not use a yoni steam during pregnancy or if you think you may be pregnant. It is not recommended to use a yoni steam if you have an IUD or during menstruation. Avoid use if you have open wounds. Do not add essential oils in your steam bath because they may burn the delicate tissues of the genitals.

NAME: Yoni Steam, Sensual
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This is a sensual steam with a blend of aphrodisiac herbs to enhance libido.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
This is a sensual steam with a blend of aphrodisiac herbs to enhance libido. 

Yoni steams bring moist heat to the womb & perineum, carrying with it the medicinal properties of the herbs. The vaginal tissue is highly absorbent, and when the herbal steam comes into contact with the body, the medicinal properties of the herbs are absorbed into the tissue and enter the bloodstream. This has a direct healing effect on the reproductive system. Yoni steams can be used to support vaginal health, cleanse the uterus, and maintain fertility. Since yoni steams increase blood flow to the vaginal area, it can have a positive effect on libido and the vaginal fluids. In general, yoni steams are beneficial for painful menstruation, irregular menstrual cycles, menstrual spotting, endometriosis, ovarian cysts, uterine fibroids, reproductive scar tissue, and previous vaginal tear or episiotomy.

DIRECTIONS: Bring 2 quarts of water to a boil. Add 1 cup of yoni steaming herbs to boiling water. Gently simmer for 10 minutes, keep covered. While your herbs simmer, set up a relaxing area for steaming. After the herbs have simmered for 10 minutes, turn off the heat and allow the water & herbs to cool for 5 minutes. Carefully pour the hot water and herbs into a heat safe basin. Position the basin below where you will sit. Disrobe from the waist down, but leave on a warm pair of socks. Sit comfortably above the basin with your yoni exposed to the steam. The steam should feel warm but not too hot. Wrap yourself in a towel from the waist down to keep yourself warm and the steam contained. Relax and enjoy the healing benefits for 20-30 minutes. After your yoni steam, dress yourself in warm dry clothing. It is recommended to steam before bed. Suggested to steam 1-2 times a month before or after your menstrual cycle

DETAILS: The resealable bag contains approximately enough herbs for 3 yoni steams.
SUB_CATEGORIES: Topical Formulations >>> Yoni Steam / Wash || Massage & Bodywork
INGREDIENTS: rose, damania, yin yang huo (epimedium)
CONTRAINDICATIONS: Do not use a yoni steam during pregnancy or if you think you may be pregnant. It is not recommended to use a yoni steam if you have an IUD or during menstruation. Avoid use if you have open wounds. Do not add essential oils in your steam bath because they may burn the delicate tissues of the genitals.

NAME: Yoni Wash - White
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Yoni Herbal Wash labeled with White is for the indication of white discharge, this should be used for damp-cold, and wind-type conditions only.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Indicated for white discharge, damp-cold and wind-type conditions only. Condition it may help with: Fungal infection, bacteria infection, yeast infection, trichomoniasis, vulvovaginitis, and cervicitis.

You can use this product in a few different ways; for mild symptoms, we recommend 70/30 wash to water dilution for douching with our yoni wash applicator. For more chronic conditions, we recommend soaking an organic cotton tampon in the wash, inserting it into the vagina, and changing the tampon every 2-3 hours. It is recommended to use the herbal wash as needed until resolved and up to 3x a day.

You can use the wash at any time externally for both mild and chronic symptoms.

Yoni Herbal Wash labeled with white is used for white discharge that may be cottage cheese textured, thick, and accompanied by a foul odor, and itching.

Free of dairy, soy, animal, gluten, nuts & fragrance.
SUB_CATEGORIES: Topical Formulations >>> Yoni Steam / Wash || Massage & Bodywork

CONTRAINDICATIONS: Do not ingest, avoid use during pregnancy or during menstruation, avoid on broken or cracked skin, and on any open sores. Always consult a Physician for a complete diagnosis for medical attention and treatment.

NAME: Yunnan Baiyao Arthritis Pain Relief Plaster (Does not contain San Qi)
CHINESE_NAME: 雲南白葯關節止痛膏貼
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Yunnan Baiyao Arthritis Pain Relief Plaster easy to use for instant pain relief!*
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION:
Yunnan Baiyao Arthritis Pain Relief Plaster easy to use for instant pain relief!*

Warnings

Allergy alert: This product contains natural rubber latex which may cause allergic reactions.

Do not use

■ on irritated or damaged skin
■ on wounds
■ otherwise than as directed

When using this product

■ avoid contact with the eyes or mucous membranes
■ do not bandage tightly

Stop use and ask a doctor if:

■ condition worsens
■ symptoms persist for more than 7 days
■ symptoms clear up and occur again within a few days
■ excessive irritation of the skin develops
■ nausea,vomiting, abdominal discomfort, diarrhea,or skin rash occurs 
■ when using for pain of arthritis：

■ pain persists for more than 10 days
■ redness is presen

■ in conditions affecting children under 12 years of age

Keep out of reach of children to avoid accidental poisoning. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.
INGREDIENTS:
Active Ingredients
Camphor 11%, Capsaicin 0.25% and Methyl Salicylate 14.24%

Inactive Ingredients
Peppermint oil, petrolatum, lanolin, rosin, and zinc oxide, on a natural latex rubber pad.
DOSAGE: ■ adults and children 3 years of age and older: remove the protective film from the plaster. Apply to affected area not more than 3 to 4 times daily ■ children under 3 years of age: consult your physician ■ refer to the above warnings; use otherwise than as directed may be dangerous
UNIT_SIZE: 6 Plaster per box - Each Patch 2.76 in. x 3.94 in. (7 cm x 10 cm)

NAME: Zheng Gu Shui, 3 oz Applicator (Brush)
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Zheng Gu Shui rectify Bone Liquid, penetrates to the bone level to promote healing and stop pain.*
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION: Zheng Gu Shui rectify Bone Liquid, penetrates to the bone level to promote healing and stop pain. It is well known for its effectiveness at healing deep bone bruises and fractures. Zheng Gu Shui is a very penetrating liquid that dispels blood stasis and fluid stagnation. As the name implies, it penetrates to the bone level to promote healing and stop pain. It is the liniment of choice for deep bone bruises and broken bones. It is also applicable for other acute injuries marked by swelling or pain. This zheng gu shui with applicator.*

Active Ingredients

ACTIONS: dispels blood stasis and fluid stagnation.

NAME: Zheng Gu Shui; Rectify Bone Liquid, 1 fl. oz.
ENGLISH_NAME: Zheng Gu Shui; Rectify Bone Liquid, 1 fl. oz.
SHORT_DESCRIPTION: This is the liniment of choice for bone fracture."* - From Fratkin - Chinese Herbal Patent Medicines.
DETAILED_DESCRIPTION: This is the liniment of choice for bone fracture.  Gauze, cotton balls or cloth soaked in the liquid, and applied directly to the fracture for thirty minutes up to two hours.  In China, TCM doctors reset the bones every three days, following with wraps soaked in Zheng Gu Shui (or a formula like it) before applying splints.  As a trauma liniment, it is applicable for other acute injuries marked by swelling or pain.  Also useful as massage liniment before or after exercise.  Can be added to bath water."* - From Fratkin - Chinese Herbal Patent Medicines.
INGREDIENTS:
Active Ingredients
Camphor 5.6% , Menthol 5.6%.

Inactive Ingredients
Alcohol, Japanese knotweed (Polygonum cuspidatum Siebold & Zucc.) rhizome, paniculate swallowwort [Pycnostelma paniculatum (Bge.) K. Schum.] root, shin-leaf prickly ash [Zanthoxylum nitidum (Roxb.) DC.] root, water, and zedoary rhizome.
DOSAGE: Soak cotton balls, gauze or cloth, and apply directly to injury.  Cover with guaze, and leave in place for 1 to 2 hours.  Repeat 2 times daily.
CONTRAINDICATIONS: Not for internal use.  Skin sensitive patients may react to this product.  Do not cover with plastic.  Do not apply to open wounds.  Avoid contact with eyes.
CHINESE_SYMPTOMOLOGY: Bone fracture; Inflammation and swelling during manual bone setting; Acute bruise; Swelling; Traumatic sprain; Torn or inflamed ligaments with or without swelling; Muscle pain; Strains
ACTIONS: Invigorates blood, breaks blood stasis, moves qi, stops bleeding, disperses swelling, strenghtens tendon and bone, dredges and opens the channels and collaterals, relieves pain.
